original: de bas na rdzogs pa'i gnas skabs las snga rol gyi gnas skabs kyi gsal ba'i snang ba ni rab kyi mtha' zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na rdzogs pa'i gnas skabs las snga rol gyi gnas skabs kyi gsal ba'i snang ba ni rab kyi mtha' zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the appearance of clarity in the state prior to the state of perfection is called the ‚Äúultimate degree of clarity.‚Äù

original: mtha' de las byung ba gang yin pa nye bar gnas pa bzhin du bsgom par bya ba'i don gyi rnam ba shin tu gsal bar 'dzin ba'i shes pa ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi mngon sum yin no //
analyzed: mtha' de las byung ba gang yin pa nye bar gnas pa bzhin du bsgom par bya ba'i don gyi rnam ba shin tu gsal bar 'dzin ba'i shes pa ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi mngon sum yin no //
translated: The knowledge that arises from that ultimate degree of clarity and that apprehends the form of the object of meditation with the utmost clarity, as if it were present before one‚Äôs very eyes, is direct perception for yogins and yoginƒ´s.

original: des na 'dir gsal ba'i rnam pa brtsam pa'i gnas skabs ni sgom ba'i rab yin la /
analyzed: des na 'dir gsal ba'i rnam pa brtsam pa'i gnas skabs ni sgom ba'i rab yin la /
translated: Therefore, in this context, the state of the beginning of clarity is the ultimate degree of clarity for one who is cultivating.

original: 'di ltar lhang tsher gyis bar du chod pa bzhin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar lhang tsher gyis bar du chod pa bzhin no //
translated: It is as if one were to be separated from the object of meditation by a wall.

original: gang gi tshe bsgom par bya ba'i don mthong ba de ni rab kyi mtha'i gnas skabs yin zhing /
analyzed: gang gi tshe bsgom par bya ba'i don mthong ba de ni rab kyi mtha'i gnas skabs yin zhing /
translated: When one sees the object of meditation, that is the ultimate degree of clarity.

original: lag mthil du shel sgong bzhag pa bzhin du bsgom pa'i don mthong ba gang yin pa de ni rnal 'byor pa'i mngon sum yin no //
analyzed: lag mthil du shel sgong bzhag pa bzhin du bsgom pa'i don mthong ba gang yin pa de ni rnal 'byor pa'i mngon sum yin no //
translated: The direct perception of a yogin or yoginƒ´ is the seeing of the object of meditation with the utmost clarity, as if it were a crystal ball placed in the palm of one‚Äôs hand.

original: de ni gsal bar snang ba yin la /
analyzed: de ni gsal bar snang ba yin la /
translated: That is the appearance of clarity.

original: gsal bar snang ba nyid kyi phyir yang rnam par mi rtog pa yin no //
analyzed: gsal bar snang ba nyid kyi phyir yang rnam par mi rtog pa yin no //
translated: It is also non-conceptual because it appears clearly.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par shes pa ni brda'i tshe mthong ba nyid du dngos po 'dzin pas sgra dang 'drer rung ba 'dzin pa yin la /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par shes pa ni brda'i tshe mthong ba nyid du dngos po 'dzin pas sgra dang 'drer rung ba 'dzin pa yin la /
translated: Conceptual consciousness, on the other hand, apprehends the object as a thing seen at the time of the convention, and so it apprehends the object as suitable to be mixed with words.

original: brda'i tshe na mthong ba yang brda'i tshe na skyes pa'i shes pa'i yul nyid yin no //
analyzed: brda'i tshe na mthong ba yang brda'i tshe na skyes pa'i shes pa'i yul nyid yin no //
translated: And the object seen at the time of the convention is the object of the consciousness arisen at the time of the convention.

original: de ltar ston gyi shes pa zhig pa ni da ltar med pa de bzhin du sngon gyi shes pa zhig pa'i yul gyi dngos po yang da ltar yod pa ma yin no ;
analyzed: de ltar ston gyi shes pa zhig pa ni da ltar med pa de bzhin du sngon gyi shes pa zhig pa'i yul gyi dngos po yang da ltar yod pa ma yin no ;
translated: Just as the past consciousness is not present now, so the object of the past consciousness is not present now.

original: / des na med pa'i rang bzhin can gyi dngos po nye bar ma yin pa 'dzin pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa ni mi gsal bar snang ba yin no //
analyzed: / des na med pa'i rang bzhin can gyi dngos po nye bar ma yin pa 'dzin pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa ni mi gsal bar snang ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, because it apprehends an object that is not present and has the nature of non-existence, conceptual consciousness appears unclearly.

original: de bas na gsal bar snang ba'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa yin la /
analyzed: de bas na gsal bar snang ba'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, because it appears clearly, it is non-conceptual.

original: tshad mas dag pa'i don 'dzin pa'i phyir mi slu ba yin no //
analyzed: tshad mas dag pa'i don 'dzin pa'i phyir mi slu ba yin no //
translated: And because it apprehends the object that is ascertained by valid cognition, it is non-deceptive.

original: de bas na mngon sum gzhan bzhin du rnal 'byor mngon sum yin no //
analyzed: de bas na mngon sum gzhan bzhin du rnal 'byor mngon sum yin no //
translated: Therefore, like other forms of perception, yogic perception is a form of direct perception.

original: rnal 'byor ni ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ni ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: ‚ÄúYoga‚Äù means meditative absorption.

original: de dag la yod pa ni rnal 'byor pa ste /
analyzed: de dag la yod pa ni rnal 'byor pa ste /
translated: Those who have it are yogis.

original: de'i shes pa ni mngon sum yin no //
analyzed: de'i shes pa ni mngon sum yin no //
translated: Their knowledge is direct perception.

original: 'o 'i sgra ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshig ste /
analyzed: 'o 'i sgra ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshig ste /
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is a term of completion.

original: mngon sum ni 'di dag tsam du zad do //üîΩde ltar mngon sum ni rtogs pa dang bral zhing /
analyzed: mngon sum ni 'di dag tsam du zad do // de ltar mngon sum ni rtogs pa dang bral zhing /
translated: Direct perception is just these.

original: ma 'khrul ba nyid dang ldan pa'i rnam par phye ba bstan nas spyod yul la log par rtogs bsal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: ma 'khrul ba nyid dang ldan pa'i rnam par phye ba bstan nas spyod yul la log par rtogs bsal ba'i phyir /
translated: Thus, having taught the definition of direct perception as being free from conceptuality and being nonerroneous, in order to dispel misconceptions about its object,

original: de'i zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúIts object is . . .‚Äù

original: mngon sum rnam pa bzhi po de'i yul de rtogs par bya ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum rnam pa bzhi po de'i yul de rtogs par bya ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin te /
translated: The object of those four types of direct perception is the particular.

original: rang thun mong ma yin pa de kho na nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: rang thun mong ma yin pa de kho na nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid do //
translated: The particular is the uncommon, thatness.

original: dngos po la ni thun @44b mong ma yin bde nyid dang spyi yang yod la /
analyzed: dngos po la ni thun @44b mong ma yin bde nyid dang spyi yang yod la /
translated: Things have both a particular and a general nature.

original: thun mong ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni mngon sum gyis gzung bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni mngon sum gyis gzung bar bya ba yin no //
translated: But that which is not common is apprehended by perception.

original: tshad ma'i yul ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: tshad ma'i yul ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The object of a means of valid knowledge is twofold:

original: gang zhig rnam par bskyed pa ste gzung bar bya ba dang / gang zhig zhen pa'i bya ba ste thob par bya'o //
analyzed: gang zhig rnam par bskyed pa ste gzung bar bya ba dang / gang zhig zhen pa'i bya ba ste thob par bya'o //
translated: that which is to be generated, i.e., apprehended, and that which is to be adhered to, i.e., attained.

original: gzung bar bya ba yang gzhan la zhen par bya ba yang gzhan yin no //
analyzed: gzung bar bya ba yang gzhan la zhen par bya ba yang gzhan yin no //
translated: The object to be apprehended is one thing, and the object to be adhered to is another.

original: 'di ltar mngon sum gyis gzung bar bya ba ni skad cig ma gcig yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar mngon sum gyis gzung bar bya ba ni skad cig ma gcig yin la /
translated: Thus, that which is to be apprehended by perception is a single moment.

original: mngon sum gyi stobs kyis bskyed ba'i nges ba'i zhen pa'i bya ba ni rgyun nyid yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi stobs kyis bskyed ba'i nges ba'i zhen pa'i bya ba ni rgyun nyid yin no //
translated: But the activity of adherence generated by the force of perception is a continuum.

original: mngon sum gyis thob par bya ba yang rgyun nyid yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis thob par bya ba yang rgyun nyid yin no //
translated: And that which is to be attained by perception is also a continuum.

original: skad cig ma ni thob par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skad cig ma ni thob par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because a moment cannot be attained.

original: da bzhin du rjes su dpag pa yang rang gi snang ba don med pa la yang rang gi snang ba don du zhen pas 'jug pa'i phyir don med pa 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: da bzhin du rjes su dpag pa yang rang gi snang ba don med pa la yang rang gi snang ba don du zhen pas 'jug pa'i phyir don med pa 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: In the same way, inference also apprehends a nonexistent object, because it engages in adhering to its own appearance as an object, even though it is meaningless.

original: yang sgro btags pa'i don 'dzin pa na rang gi mtshan nyid du 'dzin te /
analyzed: yang sgro btags pa'i don 'dzin pa na rang gi mtshan nyid du 'dzin te /
translated: Moreover, when one apprehends the object of a superimposition, one apprehends it as a specific property.

original: de bas na rjes su dpag pa 'di 'jug pa'i yul ni zhes bya ba rang gi mtshan nyid yin la /
analyzed: de bas na rjes su dpag pa 'di 'jug pa'i yul ni zhes bya ba rang gi mtshan nyid yin la /
translated: Therefore, the object of engagement of this inference is a specific property.

original: gzung bar bya ba ni don med pa yin no //
analyzed: gzung bar bya ba ni don med pa yin no //
translated: But the object of apprehension is a non-existent object.

original: des na 'dir tshad ma'i gzung bar bya ba'i yul ston pas mngon sum gyi yul rang gi mtshan nyid yin par bstan te //
analyzed: des na 'dir tshad ma'i gzung bar bya ba'i yul ston pas mngon sum gyi yul rang gi mtshan nyid yin par bstan te //
translated: Thus, since the object of apprehension of a valid cognition is being taught here, the object of direct perception is a specific property.

original: shes pa'i yul gang zhig rang gi mtshan nyid du rtogs par bya ba de yang gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: shes pa'i yul gang zhig rang gi mtshan nyid du rtogs par bya ba de yang gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is the object of consciousness that is to be understood as a specific property?

original: don gang zhes smos te /
analyzed: don gang zhes smos te /
translated: The term ‚Äúobject‚Äù is mentioned.

original: don gyi sgras ni yul gyi rnam grangs yin no //
analyzed: don gyi sgras ni yul gyi rnam grangs yin no //
translated: The term ‚Äúobject‚Äù is a synonym for ‚Äúobject-field.‚Äù

original: don de shes pa'i yul gang nye ba na gnas pa dang / mi nye ba yul thag ring po na gnas pa /
analyzed: don de shes pa'i yul gang nye ba na gnas pa dang / mi nye ba yul thag ring po na gnas pa /
translated: That object is the object of consciousness that is present in the vicinity, or that is distant, far away.

original: nye ba dar mi nye ba de dag las shes pa la snang ba gzung ba'i rnam pa gsal ba dang mi 'gal ba dag tu tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: nye ba dar mi nye ba de dag las shes pa la snang ba gzung ba'i rnam pa gsal ba dang mi 'gal ba dag tu tha dad pa'o //
translated: From those that are present in the vicinity and those that are not present in the vicinity, the appearance in consciousness of the clear aspect of the apprehended object is not contradicted. They are differentiated.

original: shes pa'i yul zhig nye bas ni shes pa'i rnam pa gsal bar snang bar byed la /
analyzed: shes pa'i yul zhig nye bas ni shes pa'i rnam pa gsal bar snang bar byed la /
translated: The object of consciousness, being near, causes the aspect of consciousness to appear clearly.

original: nye ba ma yin pa na ring ba'i yul na gnas pa nyid kyi ni mi gsal bar byed de de ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: nye ba ma yin pa na ring ba'i yul na gnas pa nyid kyi ni mi gsal bar byed de de ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: When it is not near, the object that is distant causes it to appear unclearly. That is its own characteristic.

original: dngos po thams cad kyang ring ba las ni mi gsal bar snang ngo //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad kyang ring ba las ni mi gsal bar snang ngo //
translated: Also, all things, when distant, appear unclearly.

original: nye ba las ni gsal te de nyid rang gi mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: nye ba las ni gsal te de nyid rang gi mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: When near, they appear clearly. That is their own characteristic.

original: ci'i phyir mngon sum gyi yul kho na rang gi mchan nyid yin /
analyzed: ci'i phyir mngon sum gyi yul kho na rang gi mchan nyid yin /
translated: Why is the object of direct perception only one‚Äôs own characteristic?

original: 'di ltar rnam par rtog pa'i yul gyi me la yang mthong ba'i bdag nyid kho nar nges pa yin no zhen /
analyzed: 'di ltar rnam par rtog pa'i yul gyi me la yang mthong ba'i bdag nyid kho nar nges pa yin no zhen /
translated: Because the object of conception is ascertained only in the nature of what is seen.

original: de nyid don dam par yod pa zhes smos te /
analyzed: de nyid don dam par yod pa zhes smos te /
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúThat is ultimate existence.‚Äù

original: don dam pa dang bcos ma ma yin pa ste sgro ma btags pa'i rang bzhin yin la /üîΩdes yod pas don dam par yod pa'o //
analyzed: don dam pa dang bcos ma ma yin pa ste sgro ma btags pa'i rang bzhin yin la / des yod pas don dam par yod pa'o //
translated: It is ultimate, not fabricated, and not superimposed.

original: gang gi phyir don @45a * //
analyzed: gang gi phyir don @45a * //
translated: Because it exists by that, it is ultimately existent.üîΩBecause of that, it is said, ‚ÄúThe object of conception is not ultimate existence.‚Äù

original: gang nye ba dang mi nye ba dag las snang ba gsal bar byed ba de nyid don dam par yod ba yin la /
analyzed: gang nye ba dang mi nye ba dag las snang ba gsal bar byed ba de nyid don dam par yod ba yin la /
translated: That which illuminates the appearance of things whether near or far is ultimately existent.

original: mngon sum gyi yul yang de nyid yin pa de'i phyir de kho na rang gi mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi yul yang de nyid yin pa de'i phyir de kho na rang gi mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: And since it is the object of direct perception, it is the intrinsic identity of reality.

original: yang ci'i phyir de nyid ni don dam par yod pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir de nyid ni don dam par yod pa yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it ultimately existent?

original: dngos po'i mtshan nyid don byed nus pa kho na yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: dngos po'i mtshan nyid don byed nus pa kho na yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Because the characteristic of a thing is only the ability to perform a function.

original: don du gnyer bar bya ba yin bas na don te /
analyzed: don du gnyer bar bya ba yin bas na don te /
translated: An object is that which is sought,

original: dor bar bya ba dang / blang bar bya ba'o //üîΩdor bar bya ba no dor bar bsgrub par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: dor bar bya ba dang / blang bar bya ba'o // dor bar bya ba no dor bar bsgrub par bya ba yin la /
translated: that which is to be rejected or accepted.üîΩThat which is to be rejected is to be established as something to be rejected.

original: blang bar bya ba yang blang bar bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: blang bar bya ba yang blang bar bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: And that which is to be accepted is to be established as something to be accepted.

original: don dgos pa'i byed ba ni 'grub ba'o //
analyzed: don dgos pa'i byed ba ni 'grub ba'o //
translated: The function of an object is to be accomplished.

original: de la nus pa ni mthu ste /
analyzed: de la nus pa ni mthu ste /
translated: The ability to do that is power.

original: de nyid dngos po gang yin pa'i mtshan nyid de rang bzhin yin pa de ni mtshan nyid don byed nus pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid dngos po gang yin pa'i mtshan nyid de rang bzhin yin pa de ni mtshan nyid don byed nus pa'o //
translated: That which is the characteristic of a thing, its intrinsic nature, is the characteristic of being able to perform a function.

original: de'i dngos po ni don nyid de de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni don nyid de de'i phyir ro //
translated: Its thing is its object, and that is why.

original: dngos po ni de nyid don dam par yod pa'i rnam grangs yin no //
analyzed: dngos po ni de nyid don dam par yod pa'i rnam grangs yin no //
translated: That thing is a synonym for ultimate existence.

original: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.

original: gang gi phyir don byed nus pa la ni don dam par yod pa zhes brjod la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir don byed nus pa la ni don dam par yod pa zhes brjod la /
translated: Because that which is able to perform a function is called ultimately existent,

original: nye ba dang mi nye ba las shes pa'i snang ba tha dad par byed kyang don byed nus pa yin pa de'i phyir de nyid don dam par yod pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nye ba dang mi nye ba las shes pa'i snang ba tha dad par byed kyang don byed nus pa yin pa de'i phyir de nyid don dam par yod pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: and because it makes the appearance of cognition different from what is near or far, it is able to perform a function. Therefore, that is itself ultimately existent.

original: don bya ba ni mngon sum gyi yul de nyid las 'grub kyi rnam par rtog pa'i yul la snang ba nyid du nges pa de lta na yang de mthong ba nyid ni ma yin te ;
analyzed: don bya ba ni mngon sum gyi yul de nyid las 'grub kyi rnam par rtog pa'i yul la snang ba nyid du nges pa de lta na yang de mthong ba nyid ni ma yin te ;
translated: The performance of a function is established from that very object of direct perception. Even though it is ascertained as the appearance of the object of conception, it is not seen in that way,

original: de las don bya ba med pa'i phyir dang mthong ba las ni don yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las don bya ba med pa'i phyir dang mthong ba las ni don yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no function from that, and because there is a function from seeing.

original: de bas na de nyid rang gi mtshan nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: de bas na de nyid rang gi mtshan nyid yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, that is itself the specific characteristic,

original: rnam par rtog pa'i yul ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i yul ni ma yin no //
translated: but it is not the object of conception.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid du nges pa de lta na yang de mthong ba nyid ni ma yin gang zhig rang gi mtshan nyid ma yin pa de ni spyi'i mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid du nges pa de lta na yang de mthong ba nyid ni ma yin gang zhig rang gi mtshan nyid ma yin pa de ni spyi'i mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: Although it is ascertained as the specific characteristic, it is not seen as such. What is not the specific characteristic is the general characteristic.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i shes pas nges pa'i don ni nye ba dag las shes pa'i snang ba tha dad par mi byed do //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i shes pas nges pa'i don ni nye ba dag las shes pa'i snang ba tha dad par mi byed do //
translated: The object ascertained by conceptual cognition does not cause the appearance of cognition to differ in relation to what is near.

original: 'di ltar sgro btags bar bya ba'i me ni sgro btags nas yod pa dang / sgro btags nas nye ba dang ring bar gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar sgro btags bar bya ba'i me ni sgro btags nas yod pa dang / sgro btags nas nye ba dang ring bar gnas pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the fire that is the object of superimposition exists through superimposition, and it is located near or far through superimposition.

original: sgro btags pa de nye ba dang ring ba las ni shes pa'i snang ba tha dad pa med do //
analyzed: sgro btags pa de nye ba dang ring ba las ni shes pa'i snang ba tha dad pa med do //
translated: The appearance of cognition does not differ in relation to that superimposition, whether it is near or far.

original: de bas na rang gi mtshan nyid las gzhan zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de bas na rang gi mtshan nyid las gzhan zhes bshad do //
translated: Therefore, it is said to be different from the specific characteristic.

original: spyi nyid du mtshon bas spyi'i mtshan nyid de thun mong gi ngo bo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: spyi nyid du mtshon bas spyi'i mtshan nyid de thun mong gi ngo bo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Since it is characterized as a generality, it is the general characteristic. It is synonymous with the common nature.

original: sgro btags pa'i ngo bo ni me mtha' dag gi spyi'i mtshan nyid yin la de yang rjes su dpag pa'i gzung bar bya ba yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sgro btags pa'i ngo bo ni me mtha' dag gi spyi'i mtshan nyid yin la de yang rjes su dpag pa'i gzung bar bya ba yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: The superimposed entity is the universal characteristic of all fires, and it is also the object apprehended by inference.üîΩTo demonstrate this, he says:

original: de ni rjes su @45b dpag pa'i yul yin no zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de ni rjes su @45b dpag pa'i yul yin no zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: It is the object of inference.

original: gzung bar bya ba'i ngo bo yin no //üîΩspyi'i mtshan nyid ni rjes su dpag pa'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes bshad par 'dod pas rang gi mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo bshad pa'i gzhung 'di bzlas par bya dgos pas de bas na tshegs chung bar bya ba'i phyir mngon sum gyi skabs 'di rjes su dpag pa'i
analyzed: gzung bar bya ba'i ngo bo yin no // spyi'i mtshan nyid ni rjes su dpag pa'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes bshad par 'dod pas rang gi mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo bshad pa'i gzhung 'di bzlas par bya dgos pas de bas na tshegs chung bar bya ba'i phyir mngon sum gyi skabs 'di rjes su dpag pa'i
translated: It is the object apprehended.üîΩSince it is explained that the universal characteristic is the characteristic of inference, it is necessary to repeat this treatise that explains the nature of the particular characteristic.

original: yul bstan to //
analyzed: yul bstan to //
translated: Therefore, in order to reduce the effort, the object of inference is taught in this section on direct perception.

original: yul la log par rtogs pa bsal nas 'bras bu la log par rtogs pa bsal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: yul la log par rtogs pa bsal nas 'bras bu la log par rtogs pa bsal ba'i phyir /
translated: Having cleared up misconceptions about the object, in order to clear up misconceptions about the result, he says:

original: mngon sum gyi shes pa de nyid ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: mngon sum gyi shes pa de nyid ces bya ba smos te /
translated: That very direct perceptual consciousness.

original: mngon sum gyi shes pa bstan ma thag pa gang yin pa de nyid tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi shes pa bstan ma thag pa gang yin pa de nyid tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin no //
translated: The result of valid knowledge is just that direct perception that was just explained.

original: ji ltar tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin zhe na /üîΩbshad pa don rtogs pa khong du chud pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin zhe na / bshad pa don rtogs pa khong du chud pa'o //
translated: How is it the result of valid knowledge?üîΩIt is the understanding of the object that is to be known.

original: mngon sum gyi shes pa gang la ngo bo nyid yod pa de ni don rtog pa'i ngo bo yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum gyi shes pa gang la ngo bo nyid yod pa de ni don rtog pa'i ngo bo yin te /
translated: The nature of direct perception is the nature of the understanding of the object.

original: de'i dngos po de ni de nyid de de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i dngos po de ni de nyid de de'i phyir ro //
translated: That entity of it is just that, and it is for that reason.

original: 'di skad bstan te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan te /
translated: This is what is taught.

original: phrad par byed pa'i shes pa ni tshad ma yin no //üîΩphrad par nus pa yang don med na mi 'byung ba tsam 'ba' zhig las ni ma yin te /
analyzed: phrad par byed pa'i shes pa ni tshad ma yin no // phrad par nus pa yang don med na mi 'byung ba tsam 'ba' zhig las ni ma yin te /
translated: The cognition that brings about contact is valid knowledge.üîΩAnd the ability to contact is not just the mere non-occurrence of the object.

original: sa bon la sogs pa med na mi 'byung ba yin yang myu gu la sogs pa phrad byed ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sa bon la sogs pa med na mi 'byung ba yin yang myu gu la sogs pa phrad byed ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even though the sprout, etc. does not occur in the absence of the seed, etc., it is not the bringer of contact.

original: de bas na gzung bar bya ba'i don las skyes bu zin kyang shes pa 'di'i gdon mi za bar bya pa gang byas na don dang phrad par byed pa'i las su bya ba 'ba' zhig yod pa yin la /
analyzed: de bas na gzung bar bya ba'i don las skyes bu zin kyang shes pa 'di'i gdon mi za bar bya pa gang byas na don dang phrad par byed pa'i las su bya ba 'ba' zhig yod pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, even though the person is engaged in the object that is apprehended, this consciousness must do something. The only function it has is to make contact with the object.

original: gang rjes su bsgrubs pas shes pa brad byed du gyur pa de nyid kyang tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: gang rjes su bsgrubs pas shes pa brad byed du gyur pa de nyid kyang tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin no //
translated: And that which is accomplished by the subsequent activity is the effect of valid knowledge.

original: phrad par byed pa'i phrad byed kyi bya ba yang 'jug pa'i yul rab tu sngon po kho na yin no zhes sngar bstan zin to //
analyzed: phrad par byed pa'i phrad byed kyi bya ba yang 'jug pa'i yul rab tu sngon po kho na yin no zhes sngar bstan zin to //
translated: And the activity of making contact that makes contact is only the object that is engaged. This has been explained previously.

original: don rab tu sngon po'i ngo bo yang don rtogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi mngon sum de nyid yin te /
analyzed: don rab tu sngon po'i ngo bo yang don rtogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi mngon sum de nyid yin te /
translated: And the nature of the object that is engaged is the perception that has the nature of the realization of the object.

original: de'i phyir de nyid tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de nyid tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin no //
translated: Therefore, that is the effect of valid knowledge.

original: gal te shes pa ni don rtogs pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin na 'o na tshad ma ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te shes pa ni don rtogs pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin na 'o na tshad ma ci yin zhe na /
translated: If consciousness is the effect of valid knowledge because it has the nature of the realization of the object, then what is valid knowledge?

original: smras pa / shes pa 'di'i don dang 'dra ba gang yin pa ste mtshungs pa gang yin pa tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: smras pa / shes pa 'di'i don dang 'dra ba gang yin pa ste mtshungs pa gang yin pa tshad ma yin no //
translated: He says: That which is similar to the object of this consciousness is the valid cognition.

original: 'di la rnam par shes pa yul gang las skyes pa de ni yul de dang 'dra ba yin te /
analyzed: 'di la rnam par shes pa yul gang las skyes pa de ni yul de dang 'dra ba yin te /
translated: In this regard, the consciousness that arises from a particular object is similar to that object.

original: ji ltar sngon po'i don las skyes pa na sngon po 'dra ba bzhin no //
analyzed: ji ltar sngon po'i don las skyes pa na sngon po 'dra ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, when it arises from the object blue, it is similar to blue.

original: ji ltar 'dra ba de yang rnam pa dang snang ba zhes kyang bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dra ba de yang rnam pa dang snang ba zhes kyang bya'o //
translated: That similarity is also called the aspect and the appearance.

original: shes pa las ma gtogs pa 'dra ba med pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: shes pa las ma gtogs pa 'dra ba med pa ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt similarity not something that is other than consciousness?

original: de lta yin na ni shes de nyid tshad ma @46a * //
analyzed: de lta yin na ni shes de nyid tshad ma @46a * //
translated: If that is so, then that consciousness itself is the valid knowledge.

original: yin la de nyid 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: yin la de nyid 'bras bu yin no //
translated: And it itself is the result.

original: dngos po gcig pa ni bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub par byed pa 'thad pa ma yin na ji ltar 'dra ba de tshad ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: dngos po gcig pa ni bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub par byed pa 'thad pa ma yin na ji ltar 'dra ba de tshad ma yin zhe na /
translated: It is not tenable that a single entity is both the object to be established and the means of establishing it. So how can that similarity be the valid knowledge?

original: de'i dbang po zhes smos te /
analyzed: de'i dbang po zhes smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúIts sense faculty,‚Äù

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni 'dra ba la bya'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni 'dra ba la bya'o //
translated: ‚Äúits‚Äù refers to the similarity.

original: de'i dbang gis te 'dra ba'i mthus don rtogs pa de khong du chud pa de grub pa ste 'grub pa'i gtan tshigs de'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i dbang gis te 'dra ba'i mthus don rtogs pa de khong du chud pa de grub pa ste 'grub pa'i gtan tshigs de'i phyir te /
translated: Therefore, the understanding of the object is established by the power of that, i.e., by the power of that similarity.

original: mngon sum gyi shes pa don rtog pa'i ngo bo ni 'dra ba'i dbang gis 'grub pa yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum gyi shes pa don rtog pa'i ngo bo ni 'dra ba'i dbang gis 'grub pa yin te /
translated: The nature of the cognition that understands the object is established by the power of similarity.

original: rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that it is an understanding.

original: gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa sngon par snang ba de'i phyir sngon por rtogs par nges pa yin no ;
analyzed: gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa sngon par snang ba de'i phyir sngon por rtogs par nges pa yin no ;
translated: Because the consciousness appears as blue, it is ascertained as the understanding of blue.

original: / mig la sogs pa gang dag las shes pa skyes pa de'i dbang gis ni shes pa de sngon po myong ba yin par gzhag par mi nus kyi //
analyzed: / mig la sogs pa gang dag las shes pa skyes pa de'i dbang gis ni shes pa de sngon po myong ba yin par gzhag par mi nus kyi //
translated: The eye, etc., cannot be posited as the power of the arising of the consciousness, and therefore the consciousness is posited as the experience of blue.

original: sngon po 'dra ba myong bas na sngon po rig par rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: sngon po 'dra ba myong bas na sngon po rig par rnam par gzhag go //
translated: But because it experiences the similarity of blue, it is posited as the cognition of blue.

original: gang gi dngos po gcig la 'gal bar 'gyur ba 'dir bskyed bya skyed byed kyi rgyu mtshan gyi ni bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po ni ma yin mod kyi /
analyzed: gang gi dngos po gcig la 'gal bar 'gyur ba 'dir bskyed bya skyed byed kyi rgyu mtshan gyi ni bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po ni ma yin mod kyi /
translated: The reason why it is contradictory for a single thing to be both a cause and an effect is not because the thing to be established and the means of establishing it are not the same thing.

original: 'on kyang rnam par gzhag pa dang 'jog pa'i sgo nas yin no //üîΩde bas na dngos po gcig la ngo bor 'gas ni tshad ma yin la /
analyzed: 'on kyang rnam par gzhag pa dang 'jog pa'i sgo nas yin no // de bas na dngos po gcig la ngo bor 'gas ni tshad ma yin la /
translated: Rather, it is because of the way they are posited and the way they are established.

original: ngo bo 'gas ni tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin par 'gal ba med do //üîΩ'di ltar shes pa de dang 'dra ba ni rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu yin la /
analyzed: ngo bo 'gas ni tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin par 'gal ba med do // 'di ltar shes pa de dang 'dra ba ni rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu yin la /
translated: Therefore, there is no contradiction in saying that a single thing is a valid cognition in one respect and the effect of a valid cognition in another respect.

original: rnam par gzhag par bya ba ni sngon po myong ba'i ngo bo yin no /
analyzed: rnam par gzhag par bya ba ni sngon po myong ba'i ngo bo yin no /
translated: Thus, the cognition that is similar to it is the cause of the positing of the object, and the object that is experienced, such as blue, is what is posited.

original: rnam par gzhag pa dang rnam par 'jog pa'i ngo bo yang shes pa gcig la ji ltar bu zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par gzhag pa dang rnam par 'jog pa'i ngo bo yang shes pa gcig la ji ltar bu zhe na /
translated: How can the object that is posited and the cognition that posits it be the same thing?

original: bshad pa gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa de ni 'dra ba nyams su myong nas nges par byed pa'i shes pas sngon po 'dzin par 'jog ste /
analyzed: bshad pa gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa de ni 'dra ba nyams su myong nas nges par byed pa'i shes pas sngon po 'dzin par 'jog ste /
translated: We respond: Because the consciousness that is similar to it is posited as apprehending blue by the consciousness that ascertains it through the experience of similarity.

original: de bas na myong bar 'gyur ba'i 'dra ba ni rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu yin la /
analyzed: de bas na myong bar 'gyur ba'i 'dra ba ni rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu yin la /
translated: Therefore, the similarity of experience is the cause of positing.

original: nges par byed pa'i shes pas shes pa de la sngon po myong bar rnam par gzhag pa ni rnam par gzhag par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: nges par byed pa'i shes pas shes pa de la sngon po myong bar rnam par gzhag pa ni rnam par gzhag par bya ba yin no //
translated: The cognition that ascertains posits the experience of blue in that cognition.

original: de bas na shes pa mi'i 'dra ba las bzlog nas 'dra ba'i rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu'o //üîΩsngon por la rtogs pa las bzlog ste sngon por rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid ni rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na shes pa mi'i 'dra ba las bzlog nas 'dra ba'i rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu'o // sngon por la rtogs pa las bzlog ste sngon por rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid ni rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the cause of positing the similarity of the cognition that is the opposite of the similarity of the cognition is the positing.üîΩThe essence of the cognition that conceives blue, which is the opposite of the cognition that understands blue, is the positing.

original: rnam par 'jog par byed pa ni mngon sum gyis rtog pa byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa yin gyi /
analyzed: rnam par 'jog par byed pa ni mngon sum gyis rtog pa byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa yin gyi /
translated: The positer is the conceptual cognition that arises from the direct perception.

original: mngon sum nyid ni rnam par mi rtog pa yin pa'i phyir bdag @46b nyid sngon por rtog par rnam par 'jog par mi nus so //
analyzed: mngon sum nyid ni rnam par mi rtog pa yin pa'i phyir bdag @46b nyid sngon por rtog par rnam par 'jog par mi nus so //
translated: Because direct perception itself is nonconceptual, it cannot posit itself as the cognition that conceives blue.

original: nges par byed pa'i shes pas rnam par ma bzhag pa ni sngon por rtogs pa'i ngo bos shes pa yod du zin kyang med pa dang 'dra ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: nges par byed pa'i shes pas rnam par ma bzhag pa ni sngon por rtogs pa'i ngo bos shes pa yod du zin kyang med pa dang 'dra ba kho na yin no //
translated: That which is not posited by a determining cognition, even though it exists in the nature of the cognition that apprehends blue, is just like a non-existent.

original: de bas na nges par byed pa'i shes pas rnam par shes pa sngon por rtogs pa'i ngo bor rnam par gzhag pa ni sngon por rtogs pa'i bdag nyid du yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na nges par byed pa'i shes pas rnam par shes pa sngon por rtogs pa'i ngo bor rnam par gzhag pa ni sngon por rtogs pa'i bdag nyid du yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the cognition that is posited by a determining cognition in the nature of the apprehension of blue becomes existent in the nature of the apprehension of blue.

original: de bas na mngon par zhen par byed pa nyid mngon sum gyi tshad ma yin no / zhen par ma byas par ni rnam par shes pa sngon po'i rtog pa'i bdag nyid du rnam par gzhag pa med do //
analyzed: de bas na mngon par zhen par byed pa nyid mngon sum gyi tshad ma yin no / zhen par ma byas par ni rnam par shes pa sngon po'i rtog pa'i bdag nyid du rnam par gzhag pa med do //
translated: Thus, the cause of adherence is the valid cognition of perception. Without causing adherence, the cognition cannot be posited in the nature of the apprehension of blue.

original: de lta bas na yang tshad ma'i 'bras bu don rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid ma grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na yang tshad ma'i 'bras bu don rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid ma grub pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the result of valid cognition, which is the nature of the understanding of the object, is not established.

original: de bas na sgrub par byed pa dam pa med pa'i phyir shes pa tshad ma nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na sgrub par byed pa dam pa med pa'i phyir shes pa tshad ma nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, because there is no ultimate proof, cognition cannot be valid cognition.

original: zhen pa bskyed pas 'dra ba'i dbang gis shes pa sngon por rtogs pa'i ngo bor rnam par gzhag na ni 'dra ba rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir tshad ma grub pa yin no //
analyzed: zhen pa bskyed pas 'dra ba'i dbang gis shes pa sngon por rtogs pa'i ngo bor rnam par gzhag na ni 'dra ba rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir tshad ma grub pa yin no //
translated: If it is posited as the nature of the cognition that understands blue by virtue of its resemblance to the object, then it is established as valid knowledge because it is the cause of positing resemblance.

original: ci ste de lta na mngon sum zhen pa dang bcas pa nyid tshad ma yin gyi /
analyzed: ci ste de lta na mngon sum zhen pa dang bcas pa nyid tshad ma yin gyi /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúIn that case, only direct perception that is accompanied by conception is valid knowledge,

original: nyi tshe ba ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: nyi tshe ba ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: not limited [direct perception].‚Äù

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: gang gi phyir mngon sum gyi stobs kyis byung ba'i zhen pas ni don mthong ba nyid du zhen par byed kyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir mngon sum gyi stobs kyis byung ba'i zhen pas ni don mthong ba nyid du zhen par byed kyi /
translated: Because conception that arises by the power of direct perception causes one to conceive that one sees the object,

original: rtogs par byed pa nyid du ma yin no //
analyzed: rtogs par byed pa nyid du ma yin no //
translated: but it does not cause one to understand it.

original: mthong ba yang don mngon sum du byed pa zhes bya ba mngon sum gyi byed pa yin no //
analyzed: mthong ba yang don mngon sum du byed pa zhes bya ba mngon sum gyi byed pa yin no //
translated: Seeing is the activity of direct perception, called ‚Äúmaking the object directly perceptible.‚Äù

original: rnam par rtog pa yin te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa yin te /
translated: It is conceptual.

original: 'di ltar don lkog tu gyur pa rnam par rtog pa na bdag nyid rtog par byed kyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar don lkog tu gyur pa rnam par rtog pa na bdag nyid rtog par byed kyi /
translated: When a hidden object is conceived, it is conceived by itself.

original: mthong ba ni yin no zhes rtog pa'i bdag nyid rnam par rtog pa'i byed pa yin par ni myong ba nyid la nges pa yin no //
analyzed: mthong ba ni yin no zhes rtog pa'i bdag nyid rnam par rtog pa'i byed pa yin par ni myong ba nyid la nges pa yin no //
translated: The activity of conceptual thought is ascertained by experience itself.

original: de bas na rang gi byed pa btang ste mngon sum gyi byed pa ston par byed pa las sngon gang la mngon sum du song ba'i zhen pa yod pa der mngon sum kho na 'ba' zhig tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na rang gi byed pa btang ste mngon sum gyi byed pa ston par byed pa las sngon gang la mngon sum du song ba'i zhen pa yod pa der mngon sum kho na 'ba' zhig tshad ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, having relinquished its own activity, it is shown that the activity of perception is that which was previously conceived to be the object of perception. Only perception is the valid cognition in that case.

original: mngon sum gyi le'u ste dang po'o /
analyzed: mngon sum gyi le'u ste dang po'o /
translated: This is the first chapter, on perception.

original: // / de ltar mngon sum bshad nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar mngon sum bshad nas /
translated: Having explained perception in that way,

original: rjes su dpag pa bstan pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa ni rnam pa gnyis te zhes bya ba smos te bye brag gnyis so /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa bstan pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa ni rnam pa gnyis te zhes bya ba smos te bye brag gnyis so /
translated: in order to teach inference, it says, ‚ÄúInference is of two types,‚Äù with two distinctions.

original: 'on rjes sus dpag pa'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ba la rnam par dbye ba glo bur du ci'i phyir bstan ce na /
analyzed: 'on rjes sus dpag pa'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ba la rnam par dbye ba glo bur du ci'i phyir bstan ce na /
translated: But why is the division suddenly taught here, when the definition of inference should be stated?

original: bshad pa / gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa ni sgra'i bdag nyid //
analyzed: bshad pa / gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa ni sgra'i bdag nyid //
translated: It is said: Inference for others is verbal.

original: rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa ni shes pa'i bdag nyid yin no//
analyzed: rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa ni shes pa'i bdag nyid yin no//
translated: Inference for oneself is of the nature of knowledge.

original: @47a * // de gnyis ni shin tu tha dad pas mtshan nyid gcig tu yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: @47a * // de gnyis ni shin tu tha dad pas mtshan nyid gcig tu yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Since these two are completely different, they cannot have the same characteristic.

original: de bas na de gnyis so so'i mtshan nyid nges par bstan pa'i phyir rnam par dbye ba bstan to //
analyzed: de bas na de gnyis so so'i mtshan nyid nges par bstan pa'i phyir rnam par dbye ba bstan to //
translated: Therefore, in order to teach the specific characteristics of these two, the division is taught.

original: rnam par dbye ba ni gsal ba'i dbye ba yin la /
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba ni gsal ba'i dbye ba yin la /
translated: The division is the division of the manifest.

original: gsal ba'i dbye ba bstan nas ni gsal ba so so la nges pa'i mtshan nyid bstan par nus te /
analyzed: gsal ba'i dbye ba bstan nas ni gsal ba so so la nges pa'i mtshan nyid bstan par nus te /
translated: Having taught the division of the manifest, it is possible to teach the specific characteristics of each manifest entity,

original: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: but not otherwise.

original: de bas na mtshan nyid bstan pa'i ched kho nar rnam par dbye ba smos so //
analyzed: de bas na mtshan nyid bstan pa'i ched kho nar rnam par dbye ba smos so //
translated: Therefore, the division is mentioned only for the purpose of teaching the characteristics.

original: rnam par dbye ba bstan pa med par ni mtshan nyid bstan par mi nus par rtogs nas thog mar rnam par dbye ba smras pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba bstan pa med par ni mtshan nyid bstan par mi nus par rtogs nas thog mar rnam par dbye ba smras pa yin no //
translated: Realizing that the teaching of the characteristics is not possible without the teaching of the division, the division is mentioned first.

original: rnam pa gnyis po de yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis po de yang gang zhe na /
translated: What are those two kinds?

original: rang gi don zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: rang gi don zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúInference for oneself and inference for another.‚Äù

original: rang gi yin te gang gis rang khong du chud par byed pa de ni rang gi don to //üîΩgzhan gyi don ni gzhan gyi yin te /
analyzed: rang gi yin te gang gis rang khong du chud par byed pa de ni rang gi don to // gzhan gyi don ni gzhan gyi yin te /
translated: One‚Äôs own is one‚Äôs own aim, that by which one understands for oneself.

original: gang gis gzhan khong du chud par byed pa de ni gzhan gyi don to //
analyzed: gang gis gzhan khong du chud par byed pa de ni gzhan gyi don to //
translated: The other‚Äôs is the other‚Äôs aim, that by which one causes another to understand.

original: rang gi don dang gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa de gnyis kyi nang nas rang gi don shes pas khyad par ji lta bu yin zhe na /
analyzed: rang gi don dang gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa de gnyis kyi nang nas rang gi don shes pas khyad par ji lta bu yin zhe na /
translated: Among these two, inference for oneself and inference for another, how is the difference between the two known?

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba la tshul gsum pa'i rtags las zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba la tshul gsum pa'i rtags las zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The author says, ‚Äúfrom a reason having the three modes with regard to the inferable property.‚Äù

original: gang la 'chad par 'gyur ba'i tshul gsum po yod pa de ni tshul gsum pa'o //
analyzed: gang la 'chad par 'gyur ba'i tshul gsum po yod pa de ni tshul gsum pa'o //
translated: That which has the three modes that will be explained is a reason having the three modes.

original: mtshon par byed pa'i 'dis don ston par byed pas na rtags so //
analyzed: mtshon par byed pa'i 'dis don ston par byed pas na rtags so //
translated: Since this indicates the meaning, it is a reason.

original: tshul gsum pa'i rtags de las skyes bu'i shes pa gang yin pa zhes pa 'di ni rgyu'i sgo nas bye brag tu byas pa'o //
analyzed: tshul gsum pa'i rtags de las skyes bu'i shes pa gang yin pa zhes pa 'di ni rgyu'i sgo nas bye brag tu byas pa'o //
translated: That which is born from a reason having the three modes is a cognition of a person. This is specified by way of cause.

original: tshul gsum pa'i rtags las skyes shing tshul gsum pa'i rtags la dmigs pa yang yod pas rjes su dpag par bya ba la zhes bya bas bye brag tu byas te /
analyzed: tshul gsum pa'i rtags las skyes shing tshul gsum pa'i rtags la dmigs pa yang yod pas rjes su dpag par bya ba la zhes bya bas bye brag tu byas te /
translated: And since there is also an awareness that arises from a trimodal logical reason and observes the trimodal logical reason, the phrase ‚Äúwith regard to what is to be inferred‚Äù is added to specify.

original: 'di ni yul gyi sgo nas bye brag tu byas pa yin no /
analyzed: 'di ni yul gyi sgo nas bye brag tu byas pa yin no /
translated: This is a specification from the point of view of the object.

original: tshul gsum pa'i rtags las kyes shing rjes su dpag par bya ba la dmigs pa shes pa de ni rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa yin no //
analyzed: tshul gsum pa'i rtags las kyes shing rjes su dpag par bya ba la dmigs pa shes pa de ni rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa yin no //
translated: The awareness that arises from a trimodal logical reason and observes what is to be inferred is an inference for oneself.

original: mtshan nyid la log par rtogs pa bsal nas /
analyzed: mtshan nyid la log par rtogs pa bsal nas /
translated: Having cleared up misconceptions about the definition,

original: 'bras bu la log par rtogs pa bsal ba'i phyir smras pa /
analyzed: 'bras bu la log par rtogs pa bsal ba'i phyir smras pa /
translated: he now speaks to clear up misconceptions about the result.

original: tshad ma'i 'bras bu gang yin pa de'i rnam par gzhag pa gnag yin pa de ni 'dir rjes su dpag par bya ba la yang mngon sum dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: tshad ma'i 'bras bu gang yin pa de'i rnam par gzhag pa gnag yin pa de ni 'dir rjes su dpag par bya ba la yang mngon sum dang 'dra ste /
translated: The result of valid knowledge is the establishment of the object that is its result. That is what is to be inferred here, and it is like direct perception.

original: mngon sum bzhin du rigs par bya'o //
analyzed: mngon sum bzhin du rigs par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood to be like direct perception.

original: ji ltar mngon sum sngon po dang 'dra ba nyams su myong ba na sngon por rnam par gzhag pa ste /
analyzed: ji ltar mngon sum sngon po dang 'dra ba nyams su myong ba na sngon por rnam par gzhag pa ste /
translated: When direct perception experiences something like blue, it is posited as blue.

original: de bas na @47b rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu sngon po dang 'dra ba ni tshad ma yin la /
analyzed: de bas na @47b rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu sngon po dang 'dra ba ni tshad ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, the cause of positing it is similar to blue, and it is a valid cognition.

original: sngon po khong du chud pa'i ngo bo nyid du rnam par gzhag pa ni tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: sngon po khong du chud pa'i ngo bo nyid du rnam par gzhag pa ni tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin no //
translated: The entity that is the understanding of blue is posited as the result of the valid cognition.

original: de bzhin du rjes su dpag pa yang sngon po rnam pa can du skye ba na sngon po khong du chud pa'i dngos por rnam par gzhag pa de bas na de sngon po dang 'dra ba ni 'di'i tshad ma yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin du rjes su dpag pa yang sngon po rnam pa can du skye ba na sngon po khong du chud pa'i dngos por rnam par gzhag pa de bas na de sngon po dang 'dra ba ni 'di'i tshad ma yin la /
translated: Similarly, when an inference arises with the aspect of blue, it is posited as the entity that understands blue. Therefore, that which is similar to blue is its valid cognition.

original: sngon por rnam par rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid ni tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: sngon por rnam par rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid ni tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin no //
translated: The nature of the conception of blue is the result of the valid cognition.

original: sngon por rtog pa'i rang bzhin de ni 'dra ba'i dbang gis 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sngon por rtog pa'i rang bzhin de ni 'dra ba'i dbang gis 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: That nature of the conception of blue is established by the power of similarity, not otherwise.

original: de ltar 'dir ni grangs dang mtshan nyid dang 'bras bu la log par rtogs pa dang spyod yul la log par rtogs pa ni mngon sum gyi le'u rab bsal nas /
analyzed: de ltar 'dir ni grangs dang mtshan nyid dang 'bras bu la log par rtogs pa dang spyod yul la log par rtogs pa ni mngon sum gyi le'u rab bsal nas /
translated: Thus, here, the misconception regarding number, definition, and result and the misconception regarding the domain of perception have been thoroughly refuted in the chapter on perception.

original: bstan pa'i zha ral tshul gsum pa'i rtags kyi skabs su bab nas de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bstan pa'i zha ral tshul gsum pa'i rtags kyi skabs su bab nas de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in the context of the sign of the third mode, in order to teach that,üîΩ

original: tshul gsum pa nyid kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: tshul gsum pa nyid kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Now, the occasion of the reason of the three modes of the teaching of the tenets having arrived, in order to teach that, he says, ‚ÄúThe statement of the three modes,‚Äù and so on.

original: rtags kyi tshul gsum gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: rtags kyi tshul gsum gang yin pa ste /
translated: The three modes of the reason are whatever they are.

original: de brjod pa ni 'di yin no zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: de brjod pa ni 'di yin no zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: The statement of that is this, is the remainder of the sentence.

original: tshul gsum yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: tshul gsum yang gang zhe na /
translated: What are the three modes?

original: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid rjes su dpag par bya ba de la rtags yod pa nyid du nges pa ni tshul gcig yin no //
analyzed: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid rjes su dpag par bya ba de la rtags yod pa nyid du nges pa ni tshul gcig yin no //
translated: The certainty that the reason exists in the object of inference, which has the characteristic that will be explained, is the first mode.

original: 'dir nges pa'i sgra smos pa ma byas mod kyi /
analyzed: 'dir nges pa'i sgra smos pa ma byas mod kyi /
translated: Although the word ‚Äúcertainty‚Äù is not stated here,

original: 'on kyang tha mar byas pa la gon gdu thal ba'i tshul de gnyis kyang ltos par 'gyur ba yin no ;
analyzed: 'on kyang tha mar byas pa la gon gdu thal ba'i tshul de gnyis kyang ltos par 'gyur ba yin no ;
translated: nevertheless, the two, the certainty and the statement, are related in the manner of the prior and the subsequent.

original: / gang gi phyir ji ltar myu gu la sa bon bzhin du rung btsam gyi sgo nas ni rtags lkog tu gyur ba shes pa'i rgyu mtshan ma yin te /
analyzed: / gang gi phyir ji ltar myu gu la sa bon bzhin du rung btsam gyi sgo nas ni rtags lkog tu gyur ba shes pa'i rgyu mtshan ma yin te /
translated: Because, just as a seed is in a sprout, mere possibility is not the reason for the knowledge of a hidden object.

original: ma mthong ba'i du ba las mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma mthong ba'i du ba las mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because one does not understand fire from unseen smoke.

original: bum pa la sogs pas sgron ma bzhin du rang gi yul can gyi shes pa bskyed pa la ltos nas lkog tu gyur pa gsal bar byed pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pas sgron ma bzhin du rang gi yul can gyi shes pa bskyed pa la ltos nas lkog tu gyur pa gsal bar byed pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it that a pot, etc., like a lamp, illuminates the hidden by way of generating a cognition that has it as its object,

original: mthong yang 'brel ba ma nges pa las mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthong yang 'brel ba ma nges pa las mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because one does not understand it from seeing it if the connection is not ascertained.

original: de bas na rtags kyi lkog tu gyur pa'i don rtogs pa'i byed pa ni lkog tu gyur pa'i don med na mi 'byung bar nges pa kho na yin gyi /
analyzed: de bas na rtags kyi lkog tu gyur pa'i don rtogs pa'i byed pa ni lkog tu gyur pa'i don med na mi 'byung bar nges pa kho na yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, the only cause of understanding a hidden object by means of a reason is the ascertainment that the hidden object does not occur if it does not exist.

original: gzhan ni 'ga' yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni 'ga' yang ma yin no //
translated: Nothing else is at all.

original: de bas na rtags ni byed pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dang phyogs kyi chos nyid du nges pa gdon mi za bar bya dgos pas tshul kun nges pa'i sgra la ltos par bya ba yin no /
analyzed: de bas na rtags ni byed pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dang phyogs kyi chos nyid du nges pa gdon mi za bar bya dgos pas tshul kun nges pa'i sgra la ltos par bya ba yin no /
translated: Therefore, because it is certain that a reason must be ascertained as having the nature of pervasion, negative concomitance, and property of the subject, it must rely on the statement that ascertains all the modes.

analyzed: nyid kyi tshig gis ni phyogs gcig la ma grub pa bsal ba yin te /

original: ji ltar sngon shing ni srog dang bcas pa yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar sngon shing ni srog dang bcas pa yin te /

analyzed: nyal ba'i phyir ro zhes ljon shing phyogs su byas la lo ma 'khum pa'i mtshan nyid kyi nyal ba ni phyogs gcig la ma grub pa yin te ;

analyzed: 'di ltar shing thams cad ni mtshan mo lo ma khum pa la brten pa ma yin te /

analyzed: ci ltar smras pa'i phyir 'ga' zhig ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin no zhes bya ba yin te /

analyzed: de la med pa smos pas ni 'gal ba bsal ba yin te /

analyzed: 'gal ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa yin no //

original: rtsol ba las byung ba nyid du bsgrub par bya ba la mi rtag pa nyid ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs gcig glog la sogs pa la ni yod pa yin la /
analyzed: rtsol ba las byung ba nyid du bsgrub par bya ba la mi rtag pa nyid ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs gcig glog la sogs pa la ni yod pa yin la /

analyzed: nam mkha' la sogs pa la ni med pa yin no //
translated: but it is absent in space, etc.

original: de bas na nges par byed pas 'di bsal to //
analyzed: de bas na nges par byed pas 'di bsal to //

original: med pa'i sgra'i sba rol du nges par gzung ba bya sna ni don 'dir 'gyur te /
analyzed: med pa'i sgra'i sba rol du nges par gzung ba bya sna ni don 'dir 'gyur te /

analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid la med pa gnag yin pa de ni gtan tshigs yin la /

original: de lta na yang rtsol ba las byung ba nyid mthun pa'i phyogs la yang med do /
analyzed: de lta na yang rtsol ba las byung ba nyid mthun pa'i phyogs la yang med do /
translated: But even so, being produced by effort is absent in the similar side.

original: de'i phyir gtan tshigs ma yin par 'gyur bas de ltar na de sngar ma byas so //
analyzed: de'i phyir gtan tshigs ma yin par 'gyur bas de ltar na de sngar ma byas so //

analyzed: nges pas ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa la the tsom za ba la bsal ba yin no /

original: mthun pa'i phyogs nyid la yod pa zhes bstan pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa nyid yin no zhes khong du chud pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs nyid la yod pa zhes bstan pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa nyid yin no zhes khong du chud pa ma yin nam /

original: ci'i phyir de gnyi ga gdung bar byas she na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir de gnyi ga gdung bar byas she na /

original: bshad pa / rjes su 'gro ba'am ldog na nges pa dang ldan pa kho nar rab tu sbyar bar ba'i //
analyzed: bshad pa / rjes su 'gro ba'am ldog na nges pa dang ldan pa kho nar rab tu sbyar bar ba'i //
translated: Reply: In order to show that the reason is used only when it is ascertained to be present in similar instances and absent in dissimilar instances,

original: gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir gnyi ga gzung bar byas so //
analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir gnyi ga gzung bar byas so //

original: sbyor ba 'di gnyi ga yang ma nges pa nyid yin na ni mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa tsam nye gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'dir 'gyur ro /
analyzed: sbyor ba 'di gnyi ga yang ma nges pa nyid yin na ni mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa tsam nye gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'dir 'gyur ro /
translated: If both of these formulations of the reason were uncertain, then the mere presence of the reason in similar instances and its absence in dissimilar instances would be the reason.

original: de lta na yang de'i bu yin pa'i phyir de sngo bsangs yin te /
analyzed: de lta na yang de'i bu yin pa'i phyir de sngo bsangs yin te /
translated: Even so, because he is his son, he is dark-complexioned,

original: snang ba'i bu bzhin no zhes bya ba'i de'i bu nyid gtan tshigs yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snang ba'i bu bzhin no zhes bya ba'i de'i bu nyid gtan tshigs yin par 'gyur ro //

original: de'i phyir gang gis sgrub par byed pa dang bsgrub par bya ba dang 'brel bar rtogs par 'gyur ba rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa nges pa dang ldan pa dag kho nar sbyar bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gang gis sgrub par byed pa dang bsgrub par bya ba dang 'brel bar rtogs par 'gyur ba rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa nges pa dang ldan pa dag kho nar sbyar bar bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, only those which are ascertained as having positive and negative concomitance should be employed, since it is only they which can be understood to be related as that which proves and that which is to be proved.

original: nges pa dang ldan pa kho nar gdon mi za bar sbyar bar bya ba na yang gnyis las gcig kho na sbyar bar bya'i //
analyzed: nges pa dang ldan pa kho nar gdon mi za bar sbyar bar bya ba na yang gnyis las gcig kho na sbyar bar bya'i //
translated: And even when it is necessary to employ only those which are ascertained, only one of the two should be employed,

original: gnyi ga ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gnyi ga ni ma yin te /
translated: not both.

original: de bas rjes su 'gro ba'am ldog pa'i nges pa dang ldan pa kho na sbyar bar bya'o zhes bsal ba pa'i phyir gnyi ga gzung ba yin no ;
analyzed: de bas rjes su 'gro ba'am ldog pa'i nges pa dang ldan pa kho na sbyar bar bya'o zhes bsal ba pa'i phyir gnyi ga gzung ba yin no ;
translated: Therefore, only those which are ascertained as having positive or negative concomitance should be employed.üîΩBut both are mentioned in order to eliminate the doubt that only one should be employed.

original: / tshul de gsum bstan pa'i zhar la rjes su dpag par bya ba dang / mthun pa'i phyogs dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs bstan pas de dag gi mtshan nyid brjod dgos so //
analyzed: / tshul de gsum bstan pa'i zhar la rjes su dpag par bya ba dang / mthun pa'i phyogs dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs bstan pas de dag gi mtshan nyid brjod dgos so //
translated: In the course of teaching those three modes, the inferential mark which is similar to the object to be inferred and that which is dissimilar to it are taught, so it is necessary to state their definitions.

original: de la rjes su dpag par bya ba gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de la rjes su dpag par bya ba gang yin zhe na /

original: rjes su dpag pa bya ba ni 'dri zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa bya ba ni 'dri zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The object to be inferred is stated in the passage beginning with ‚Äúthe question.‚Äù

analyzed: @49a * // gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid gtan la 'bebs pa 'dir chos can ni rjes su dpag par bya ba yin no /

analyzed: gzhan dur sgrub par bya ba khong du chud par bya ba'i tshe ni spyi rjes su dpag par bya ba yin la / khyab pa nges par byed pa'i tshe ni chos rjes su dpag par bya ba yin par bstan pa'i phyir /

original: 'dir zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba smos so //

analyzed: shes pa 'dod pa ste khong du chud par 'dod pa'i bye brag gi chos can gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //

analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs gang zhe na / mthun pa'i phyogs ni don mtshungs pa'o //

analyzed: mtshungs pa 'dra ba'i don nye bar btags nas mthun pa'i phyogs su brjod pa yin la /

analyzed: de yang mtshungs pa'i sgras khyad par du byas pa yin no /
translated: Moreover, the term ‚Äúsimilar‚Äù is a qualifier.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs ni mtshungs pa'i phyogs te /

analyzed: phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs gnyis kyi spyi'i gang yin snyam pa la /

analyzed: bsgrubs par bya ba'i chos kyis spyis zhes bya ba smras te /

analyzed: bye brag bsgrub par bya ba ma yin gyi /

analyzed: 'on te spyi yin pa de bas na 'dir spyi bsgrub par bstan to /

analyzed: de ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyang yin la /

analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi spyis phyogs dang mtshungs pa ni mthun pa'i phyogs yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs gang zhe na /
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs gang zhe na /
