original: gang gi phyir rang bzhin 'brel pa yod na sgrub par byed pa'i don gyis bsgrub par bya ba'i don go bar byed pa yin pa de bas na gsum char yang go bar byed pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rang bzhin 'brel pa yod na sgrub par byed pa'i don gyis bsgrub par bya ba'i don go bar byed pa yin pa de bas na gsum char yang go bar byed pa nyid yin la /
translated: Because if there were a natural relation, the meaning of the proof would make the meaning of the probandum understood. Therefore, all three are the means of understanding.

original: gzhan ni go bar byed pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni go bar byed pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The other is not the means of understanding.

original: ci'i phyir rang bzhin 'brel pa yod pa kho na go bar byed pa'i dngos po yin la gzhan ni ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rang bzhin 'brel pa yod pa kho na go bar byed pa'i dngos po yin la gzhan ni ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it that only that which has a natural relation is the means of understanding, but the other is not?

original: des ma 'brel na zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: des ma 'brel na zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúIf it is not related by that.‚Äù

original: des zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: des zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin bstan pa yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù indicates nature.

original: rang bzhin des ma 'brel pa ni des ma bral ba'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin des ma 'brel pa ni des ma bral ba'o //
translated: Not related by that nature is not separated from that.

original: gang zhig gang la rang bzhin gyis ma 'brel pa de ni der mi 'khrul par nges pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang la rang bzhin gyis ma 'brel pa de ni der mi 'khrul par nges pa med pa yin te /
translated: That which is not naturally related to something does not have the certainty of non-deception with regard to that.

original: 'brel pa'i yul gang @52a * //üîΩyin pa de la mi 'khrul pa ni der mi 'khrul pa'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa'i yul gang @52a * // yin pa de la mi 'khrul pa ni der mi 'khrul pa'o //
translated: That which is the object of a relationüîΩis non-deceptive with regard to that.

original: de'i nges pa ni der mi 'khrul par nges pa ste /
analyzed: de'i nges pa ni der mi 'khrul par nges pa ste /
translated: The certainty of that is the certainty of non-deception with regard to that.

original: de med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that does not exist.

original: don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning is as follows:üîΩIf something is not essentially related to something, then it is not necessarily the case that it is nonerroneously related to that object.

original: gang zhig gang la rang bzhin ma 'brel pa de ni ma 'brel pa'i yul de la gdon mi za bar mi 'khrul pa yin no zhes de dag med na mi 'byung ba nges pa mi 'khrul pa nges pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig gang la rang bzhin ma 'brel pa de ni ma 'brel pa'i yul de la gdon mi za bar mi 'khrul pa yin no zhes de dag med na mi 'byung ba nges pa mi 'khrul pa nges pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, if it is not the case that the reason is essentially related to the probandum, then it is not the case that the reason is necessarily nonerroneously related to the probandum.

original: go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos po ni ma 'khrul pa nges pa las yin te /
analyzed: go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos po ni ma 'khrul pa nges pa las yin te /
translated: The relation of the object to be inferred and the inferential sign is based on nonerroneous relation.

original: rung ba tsam gyi sgo nas ni rtags sgron ma bzhin du lkog tu gyur pa rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan du 'dod pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rung ba tsam gyi sgo nas ni rtags sgron ma bzhin du lkog tu gyur pa rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan du 'dod pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that the reason is asserted to be the cause of the understanding of the hidden object merely on the ground of being suitable.

original: 'on kyang mi 'khrul pa nyid du nges pa yin no ;
analyzed: 'on kyang mi 'khrul pa nyid du nges pa yin no ;
translated: Rather, it is ascertained to be nonerroneous.

original: / de bas na rang bzhin 'brel pa yod na ni med na mi 'byung ba nges pa yin la /
analyzed: / de bas na rang bzhin 'brel pa yod na ni med na mi 'byung ba nges pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, if there is essential relation, then there is the relation of the absence of the one in the absence of the other.

original: de las go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa dngos po yin no //
analyzed: de las go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa dngos po yin no //
translated: From that, there is the relation of the object to be inferred and the inferential sign.

original: de bas na rang bzhin 'brel pa yod na don gyis don go bar byed kyi /
analyzed: de bas na rang bzhin 'brel pa yod na don gyis don go bar byed kyi /
translated: Therefore, if there is essential relation, then the object is understood by the object.

original: gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya bar gnas so //
analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya bar gnas so //
translated: It is not otherwise.

original: gzhan la rag las pa ma yin pa ni gzhan la rag las pa 'brel pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gzhan la rag las pa ma yin pa ni gzhan la rag las pa 'brel pa ma yin nam /
translated: If it is not dependent on another, then it is not related to another, is it?

original: 'dir bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa de gnyis gang zhig gang la 'brel pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa de gnyis gang zhig gang la 'brel pa yin zhe na /
translated: Here, what is the relation between the two, the probandum and the probans?

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i don la rtags 'brel pa de yang zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i don la rtags 'brel pa de yang zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The statement ‚Äúthat relation of the probans to the probandum‚Äù is made in response to this question.

original: de yang bsgrub par bya ba'i don la rtags kyi rang bzhin 'brel pa yin te /
analyzed: de yang bsgrub par bya ba'i don la rtags kyi rang bzhin 'brel pa yin te /
translated: That relation of the probans to the probandum is the relation of the nature of the probans to the probandum.

original: rtags ni gzhan la rag lus pa yin pa'i phyir 'brel pa yin la bsgrub par bya ba'i don la gzhan la rag lus pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'brel pa'i yul yin gyi /
analyzed: rtags ni gzhan la rag lus pa yin pa'i phyir 'brel pa yin la bsgrub par bya ba'i don la gzhan la rag lus pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'brel pa'i yul yin gyi /
translated: The probans is related to the probandum because it is dependent on another, but the probandum is not dependent on another, and so it is the domain of the relation.

original: 'brel pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //üîΩde la don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'brel pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // de la don ni 'di yin te /
translated: It is not the relation itself. This is the meaning.

original: de'i bdag nyid du khyad par med kyang 'brel pa gang yin pa ni go bar byed pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid du khyad par med kyang 'brel pa gang yin pa ni go bar byed pa yin la /
translated: Although there is no difference in their nature, that which is the relation is the indicator.

original: 'brel pa'i yul gang yin pa de ni go bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'brel pa'i yul gang yin pa de ni go bar bya ba yin no //
translated: The object that is related is the object to be understood.

original: gang zhig chos gang gi rang bzhin du nges pa de ni de dang 'brel pa yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig chos gang gi rang bzhin du nges pa de ni de dang 'brel pa yin te /
translated: That which is ascertained as the nature of a certain thing is related to it.

original: dper na mi rtag pa nyid la rtsol ba las byung ba nyid ces bya ba yin no //
analyzed: dper na mi rtag pa nyid la rtsol ba las byung ba nyid ces bya ba yin no //
translated: For example, impermanence is related to that which is produced by effort.

original: gang zhig de dang gzhan gyi rang bzhin de ni 'brel pa'i yul yin gyi /
analyzed: gang zhig de dang gzhan gyi rang bzhin de ni 'brel pa'i yul yin gyi /
translated: That which is the nature of both that and something else is the object of a relation,

original: 'brel pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'brel pa ni ma yin te /
translated: but it is not a relation.

original: dper na rtsol ba las byung ba nyid ces bya ba la mi rtag pa nyid ces bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na rtsol ba las byung ba nyid ces bya ba la mi rtag pa nyid ces bya ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, that which is produced by effort is the object of the relation of impermanence.

original: go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos po nges pa la ltos pa yin la /
analyzed: go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos po nges pa la ltos pa yin la /
translated: The nature of the object to be understood and the object that understands it depends on ascertainment.

original: rtsol ba las byung ba nyid kyang rang bzhin du nges pa yin te /
analyzed: rtsol ba las byung ba nyid kyang rang bzhin du nges pa yin te /
translated: That which is produced by effort is ascertained as the nature of something else.

original: de'i phyir de nyid mi rtag pa nyid @52b dang 'brel pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de nyid mi rtag pa nyid @52b dang 'brel pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is related to impermanence.

original: de bas na nges pa'i yul kho na go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos po yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na nges pa'i yul kho na go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos po yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: Thus, only the object of ascertainment is the object to be understood and the object that understands it, not anything else.

original: ci'i phyir rtags rang bzhin dang 'brel pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rtags rang bzhin dang 'brel pa yin zhe na /
translated: Why is the reason related to the nature of the probandum?

original: dngos su na zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: dngos su na zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, ‚Äúin reality,‚Äù

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i don de'i bdag nyid gang yin pa de'i dngos po ni de nyid de /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i don de'i bdag nyid gang yin pa de'i dngos po ni de nyid de /
translated: that is, the nature of that which is the nature of the object of the probandum is reality.

original: de bas na de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bas na de'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, because of that.

original: gang gi phyir sgrub par byed pa ni bsgrub par bya ba'i rang bzhin yin pa de bas na der rang bzhin 'brel zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sgrub par byed pa ni bsgrub par bya ba'i rang bzhin yin pa de bas na der rang bzhin 'brel zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Since the proof is the nature of the probandum, therefore, the meaning of ‚Äúnature related‚Äù is that.

original: ci ste bsgrub par bya ba'i rang bzhin sgrub par byed pa yin na bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa tha mi dad pa'i phyir dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste bsgrub par bya ba'i rang bzhin sgrub par byed pa yin na bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa tha mi dad pa'i phyir dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if the proof is the nature of the probandum, then because the probandum and the proof are not different, the meaning of the thesis would be a part of the proof.

original: dngos su na zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: dngos su na zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, ‚Äúin reality,‚Äù

original: 'di gnyis don dam par yod pa'i tshul gyis tha dad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di gnyis don dam par yod pa'i tshul gyis tha dad pa ma yin no //
translated: because these two are not different in the manner of existing ultimately.

original: rtag par rtog pa'i yul sgro btags pa'i ngo ngo la ltos na ni /
analyzed: rtag par rtog pa'i yul sgro btags pa'i ngo ngo la ltos na ni /
translated: But in terms of the superimposition that is the object of the conception of permanence,

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa tha dad pa yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa tha dad pa yin te /
translated: The probandum and the probans are different,

original: nges pa la ltos pa nyid ni go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges pa la ltos pa nyid ni go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the former is what is to be known and the latter is the means of knowing.

original: de'i phyir de gnyis kyi tha dad pa ni nges pa la gnas pa'i rang bzhin la ltos pa kho nar rigs kyi dngos po tha dad pa las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de gnyis kyi tha dad pa ni nges pa la gnas pa'i rang bzhin la ltos pa kho nar rigs kyi dngos po tha dad pa las ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, their difference is reasonable only in terms of the nature of the ascertainment, not in terms of the difference of things.

original: de'i bdag nyid 'ga' zhig las ni ma yin gyi /üîΩbsgrub par bya ba las byung ba'i rtags de nyid las kyang yin te /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid 'ga' zhig las ni ma yin gyi / bsgrub par bya ba las byung ba'i rtags de nyid las kyang yin te /
translated: It is not from any identity of the two,üîΩbut from the probans that arises from the probandum.

original: de las byung ba'i rtags kyang bsgrub par bya ba'i don dang rang bzhin 'brel pa yin no //
analyzed: de las byung ba'i rtags kyang bsgrub par bya ba'i don dang rang bzhin 'brel pa yin no //
translated: The probans that arises from that is related to the meaning of the probandum and the nature.

original: ci'i phyir gyu mtshan gnyis kyis rang bzhin 'brel pa'i rtags yin gyi /
analyzed: ci'i phyir gyu mtshan gnyis kyis rang bzhin 'brel pa'i rtags yin gyi /
translated: Why is the probans related to the nature by the two characteristics,

original: gzhan gyis ni ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan gyis ni ma yin zhe na /
translated: but not by others?

original: de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa dang zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa dang zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: It is said: ‚ÄúIt is not the nature of that.‚Äù

original: de'i rang bzhin gang la yod pa ni de'i rang bzhin yin no //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin gang la yod pa ni de'i rang bzhin yin no //
translated: That which has the nature of that is the nature of that.

original: de'i rang bzhin yod pa ma yin pa de de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin yod pa ma yin pa de de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'o //
translated: That which is not its nature is not its nature.

original: 'di de las byung ba 'di yin pas de las byung ba'o //
analyzed: 'di de las byung ba 'di yin pas de las byung ba'o //
translated: That which arises from this is arisen from this.

original: de lta bu ma yin pa de ni de las byung ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu ma yin pa de ni de las byung ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: That which does not arise in this way is not arisen from this.

original: gang zhig gang gi rang bzhin dang gang las byung ba yang ma yin pa de ni de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'o//
analyzed: gang zhig gang gi rang bzhin dang gang las byung ba yang ma yin pa de ni de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'o//
translated: That which is neither its nature nor arisen from it is not its nature.

original: 'di de la las byung ba de 'di ba dang / skyed par byed pa ma yin pa de dang 'di 'brel pa med pa'i rang bzhin yin pas 'brel pa med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩci ste de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa dang / skyed par byed pa ma yin pa dang yang 'brel pa'i rang bzhin 'ga' zhig yod na ni rgyu @53a * //
analyzed: 'di de la las byung ba de 'di ba dang / skyed par byed pa ma yin pa de dang 'di 'brel pa med pa'i rang bzhin yin pas 'brel pa med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro // ci ste de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa dang / skyed par byed pa ma yin pa dang yang 'brel pa'i rang bzhin 'ga' zhig yod na ni rgyu @53a * //
translated: That which is not arisen from this is not arisen from this, and that which is not a producer is not a producer. Since it is unrelated by nature, it is unrelated by nature.

original: mtshan gzhan las kyang rang bzhin 'brel par 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: mtshan gzhan las kyang rang bzhin 'brel par 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: If something were related by nature to that which is not its nature and is not a producer, then its nature would be related to another cause.

original: 'brel pa'i rang bzhin nyid ni rang bzhin 'brel pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'brel pa'i rang bzhin nyid ni rang bzhin 'brel pa yin gyi /
translated: But the nature of being related is related by nature.

original: gzhan la ni rag las pa'i rang bzhin 'ga' yang med do //üîΩde bas na de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba gnyis kho nas rang bzhin 'brel pa yin no ;
analyzed: gzhan la ni rag las pa'i rang bzhin 'ga' yang med do // de bas na de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba gnyis kho nas rang bzhin 'brel pa yin no ;
translated: But there is no nature whatsoever that depends on another.üîΩTherefore, the relation of nature is restricted to identity and origination.

original: / de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba kho nas rang bzhin 'brel pa yin du zad mod /
analyzed: / de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba kho nas rang bzhin 'brel pa yin du zad mod /
translated: But the relation of nature is restricted to identity and origination.

original: 'bras bu dang rang bzhin gnyis kho na ji ltar go bar byed pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'bras bu dang rang bzhin gnyis kho na ji ltar go bar byed pa yin zhe na /
translated: How are cause and nature restricted to the relation of effect and nature?

original: de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba de gnyis rang bzhin dang 'bras bu kho na yin pas zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba de gnyis rang bzhin dang 'bras bu kho na yin pas zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúBecause identity and origination are restricted to nature and effect.‚Äù

original: bas zhes bya ba ni de bas na zhes bya ba'i don yin te /
analyzed: bas zhes bya ba ni de bas na zhes bya ba'i don yin te /
translated: The word ‚Äúbut‚Äù has the meaning of ‚Äútherefore.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir rang bzhin dang 'bras bu kho na la de'i bdag nyid dang / de las byung bar gnas la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rang bzhin dang 'bras bu kho na la de'i bdag nyid dang / de las byung bar gnas la /
translated: Because identity and origination are restricted to nature and effect.

original: go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos po yang de'i rgyu mtshan can yin pa de bas na 'bras bu dang rang bzhin de gnyis kho nas dngos po yod par grub po //
analyzed: go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos po yang de'i rgyu mtshan can yin pa de bas na 'bras bu dang rang bzhin de gnyis kho nas dngos po yod par grub po //
translated: The object of understanding and the understanding itself are also based on that reason. Therefore, an existent entity is established by only those two: effect and nature.

original: 'on te dgag pa sgrub pa ni mi snang ba mi dmigs pa las kyang ci'i phyir 'dod par mi bya zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te dgag pa sgrub pa ni mi snang ba mi dmigs pa las kyang ci'i phyir 'dod par mi bya zhe na /
translated: But if the establishment of negation is not accepted even from non-observation of the non-appearing, why is that?

original: smras pa / dgag pa'i tha snyad bsgrub pa ni gang gi phyir snang ba mi dmigs pa ci skad smos pa kho na las 'gyur te /
analyzed: smras pa / dgag pa'i tha snyad bsgrub pa ni gang gi phyir snang ba mi dmigs pa ci skad smos pa kho na las 'gyur te /
translated: It is said: The establishment of the expression of negation is only from the non-observation of the appearing, as stated.

original: de bas na de las gzhan ma bstan to //
analyzed: de bas na de las gzhan ma bstan to //
translated: Therefore, it is not taught as anything other than that.

original: de tsam gyis ci'i phyir yin zhe na smras pa ;
analyzed: de tsam gyis ci'i phyir yin zhe na smras pa ;
translated: Why is that? It is said:

original: der dgag par bya ba'i dngos po yod na ni gang gi phyir snang ba mi dmigs pa mi srid do //
analyzed: der dgag par bya ba'i dngos po yod na ni gang gi phyir snang ba mi dmigs pa mi srid do //
translated: If the negated entity exists there, then the non-observation of the appearing is impossible.

original: de mi srid pa de bas na de las dgag par 'grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de mi srid pa de bas na de las dgag par 'grub pa yin no //
translated: Because that is impossible, negation is established from that.

original: 'on te de 'ba' zhig las ci'i phyir yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te de 'ba' zhig las ci'i phyir yin zhe na /
translated: But why is it only from that? It is said:

original: gzhan du na zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gzhan du na zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Otherwise...

original: dngos po yod pa la de mi snang ba'i mi dmigs pa srid pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gzhan du zhes bya ba'i sgra'i don yin no //
analyzed: dngos po yod pa la de mi snang ba'i mi dmigs pa srid pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gzhan du zhes bya ba'i sgra'i don yin no //
translated: The meaning of the word ‚Äúelsewhere‚Äù is that it is possible that a non-apprehension of something existent does not appear.

original: de lta yin pa de bas na mi dmigs pa'i gzhan las dgag pa 'grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta yin pa de bas na mi dmigs pa'i gzhan las dgag pa 'grub pa ma yin no //
translated: Since that is the case, a negation from another non-apprehension is not established.

original: dngos po yod kyang de srid pa zhes bya ba 'di gar la zhe na /
analyzed: dngos po yod kyang de srid pa zhes bya ba 'di gar la zhe na /
translated: Where is it said that ‚Äúeven though a thing exists, it is possible that it is not apprehended‚Äù?

original: yul dang dus zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: yul dang dus zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúIn regard to place and time, etc.‚Äù

original: 'dir rkyen gzhan tshogs pa dang rang bzhin khyad par can yin pa'i phyir dmigs pa'i rig gyur pa'i don bstan la /
analyzed: 'dir rkyen gzhan tshogs pa dang rang bzhin khyad par can yin pa'i phyir dmigs pa'i rig gyur pa'i don bstan la /
translated: Here, the meaning of the statement ‚Äúeven though the object exists, it is not apprehended‚Äù is taught by the fact that the collection of other conditions is present and by the fact that the nature is special.

original: gnyis las gcig med na yang gcig kyang dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du ma gyur pa'i don bstan to //
analyzed: gnyis las gcig med na yang gcig kyang dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du ma gyur pa'i don bstan to //
translated: The meaning of the statement ‚Äúeven though the object exists, it is not apprehended‚Äù is taught by the fact that even when one of the two is absent, the other is not characterized by apprehension.

original: yul 'dir dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du ma gyur pa rnams la zhes bya bas ni rkyen gzhan dang bral ba can @53b bstan to //
analyzed: yul 'dir dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du ma gyur pa rnams la zhes bya bas ni rkyen gzhan dang bral ba can @53b bstan to //
translated: ‚ÄúIn regard to those that are not characterized by apprehension in this place‚Äù teaches that they are devoid of other conditions.

original: gnyis las dus dang rang bzhin gyis bskal pa zhes bya bas ni rang bzhin gyis bskal pa bstan to //
analyzed: gnyis las dus dang rang bzhin gyis bskal pa zhes bya bas ni rang bzhin gyis bskal pa bstan to //
translated: The two kinds of impossibility, temporal and natural, are mentioned in order to show the natural impossibility.

original: yul dang dus dang rang bzhin dang de rnams kyis bskal pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: yul dang dus dang rang bzhin dang de rnams kyis bskal pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: The impossibility of the object, time, and nature are to be supplied.

original: de dag la dngos po med par nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag la dngos po med par nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no certainty of nonexistence in those.

original: dngos po yod pa la de srid par 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: dngos po yod pa la de srid par 'dod pa yin no //
translated: The existence of the thing is accepted as long as it is possible.

original: gang las nges pa med ce na /
analyzed: gang las nges pa med ce na /
translated: From what is there no certainty?

original: de dag la sgrub pa po rang gi mngon sum gang yin pa de log kyang de rgyus ngos po med par nges pa med do //
analyzed: de dag la sgrub pa po rang gi mngon sum gang yin pa de log kyang de rgyus ngos po med par nges pa med do //
translated: Even when the direct perception of the person who is the agent of the proof is overturned, there is no certainty of nonexistence due to the cause.

original: gang gi phyir dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa ma yin pa dag la bdag nyid kyis mngon sum log pa'i mtshan nyid mi snang ba mi dmigs pa srid do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa ma yin pa dag la bdag nyid kyis mngon sum log pa'i mtshan nyid mi snang ba mi dmigs pa srid do //
translated: Because it is possible that nonapprehension, which is the characteristic of the absence of the appearance of the object itself, is present in things that are not the characteristics of the object.

original: de bas na ji skad du bstan pa kho nas dgag pa 'grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na ji skad du bstan pa kho nas dgag pa 'grub pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, as it has been taught, the refutation is established.

original: 'on te snang ba mi dmigs pa 'di gang gi dus na tshad ma yin /
analyzed: 'on te snang ba mi dmigs pa 'di gang gi dus na tshad ma yin /
translated: But when is this nonapprehension of appearance a valid cognition?

original: ci'i ngo bo yin na ci zhig byed ce na /
analyzed: ci'i ngo bo yin na ci zhig byed ce na /
translated: If it is asked what is its nature, it is said:

original: mi rmongs pa zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: mi rmongs pa zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: ‚Äúnon-delusion.‚Äù

original: sgrub pa po'i mngon sum ni bum pa la sogs pa'i don to //
analyzed: sgrub pa po'i mngon sum ni bum pa la sogs pa'i don to //
translated: The direct perception of the practitioner is the object such as a pot.

original: de log pa ni mi dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: de log pa ni mi dmigs pa ste /
translated: The negation of that is non-apprehension.

original: de'i rang bzhin med pa'i ngo bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin med pa'i ngo bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is the nature of non-existence.

original: de bas na rang bzhin med pa nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de bas na rang bzhin med pa nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, non-existence is not the probandum,

original: rang bzhin mi dmigs par grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin mi dmigs par grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the non-apprehension of nature is established.

original: bum pa la sogs pa med du zin kyang shes pa gcig la 'dres ba snang ba na mthong ba'i tshogs pa tshang ba can du shes pas blta bar bya ba nyid du brtag par bya ba yin pa'i phyir mngon sum zhes bstan to //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa med du zin kyang shes pa gcig la 'dres ba snang ba na mthong ba'i tshogs pa tshang ba can du shes pas blta bar bya ba nyid du brtag par bya ba yin pa'i phyir mngon sum zhes bstan to //
translated: Even if the pot, etc. do not exist, when they appear mixed in a single cognition, it is known as complete in the assembly of what is seen, and therefore it is taught as direct perception, because it is to be considered as the object of seeing.

original: de bas na shes pa gcig la 'dres ba snang ba'i don dang / shes pa de ni mngon log pa //
analyzed: de bas na shes pa gcig la 'dres ba snang ba'i don dang / shes pa de ni mngon log pa //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the appearance mixed in a single cognition and that cognition is the negation of the object.

original: zhes bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ste /
translated: It is said:üîΩ‚Äúnon-apprehension.‚Äù

original: snang ba'i don dang blo de las mthong ba'i tshogs pa tshang ba nyid kyi sog nas mngon sum nyid du brtag par bya bar log par khong du chud pa yin no //
analyzed: snang ba'i don dang blo de las mthong ba'i tshogs pa tshang ba nyid kyi sog nas mngon sum nyid du brtag par bya bar log par khong du chud pa yin no //
translated: The collection of the object of appearance and the mind seeing it is complete, and therefore it is understood that the non-appearance of the object is a non-appearance of the mind.

original: de bas na don dang shes pa kho na la mngon sum gyis bum pa med pa zhes bya'i //
analyzed: de bas na don dang shes pa kho na la mngon sum gyis bum pa med pa zhes bya'i //
translated: Therefore, it is only the object and the consciousness that are called ‚Äúdirect perception.‚Äù

original: log pa tsam ni 'dir med pa zhes mi bya ste /
analyzed: log pa tsam ni 'dir med pa zhes mi bya ste /
translated: The mere non-appearance is not called ‚Äúnon-existence‚Äù here.

original: log pa tsam las snang ba log par nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: log pa tsam las snang ba log par nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not certain that the appearance is non-existent from the mere non-appearance.

original: snang ba mi dmigs pa las snang ba log par nges pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: snang ba mi dmigs pa las snang ba log par nges pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: Isn‚Äôt it certain that the appearance is non-existent from the non-apprehension of the appearance?

original: de bden mod kyi shes pa gcig la 'dre ba 'ba' zhig snang na bum pa la sogs pa ci ste yod na ni snang ba kho nar 'gyur ro zhes snang bar rtog pa yin la /
analyzed: de bden mod kyi shes pa gcig la 'dre ba 'ba' zhig snang na bum pa la sogs pa ci ste yod na ni snang ba kho nar 'gyur ro zhes snang bar rtog pa yin la /
translated: That is true, but when only the mixture of consciousnesses appears, if the pot, etc. existed, it would only appear. Thus, it is the appearance that is imagined.

original: de las ni snang ba mi dmigs pa nges pa yin no //
analyzed: de las ni snang ba mi dmigs pa nges pa yin no //
translated: And from that, the non-apprehension of the appearance is ascertained.

original: snang ba mi dmigs pa nges pa'i shugs kyis kyang snang ba med pa nges pa yin te /
analyzed: snang ba mi dmigs pa nges pa'i shugs kyis kyang snang ba med pa nges pa yin te /
translated: And by the force of the ascertainment of the non-apprehension of the appearance, the non-existence of the appearance is ascertained.

original: @54a * // ci ste der snang du rung ba yod na ni snang ba mi dmigs pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: @54a * // ci ste der snang du rung ba yod na ni snang ba mi dmigs pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were possible for it to appear there, then the non-apprehension of appearance would not be established.

original: de bas na snang ba mi dmigs pa'i shugs kyis nang ba med par shes pa yin na /
analyzed: de bas na snang ba mi dmigs pa'i shugs kyis nang ba med par shes pa yin na /
translated: Therefore, if the non-apprehension of appearance is the force by which the absence of an internal object is known,

original: tha dad du byed pa ma yin pas snang ba mi dmigs pas tha snyad du byas pa yin no //
analyzed: tha dad du byed pa ma yin pas snang ba mi dmigs pas tha snyad du byas pa yin no //
translated: then since it is not a distinct act, the non-apprehension of appearance is the act.

original: de bas na don gzhan shes pa gcig la 'dre bar snang ba na de'i shes pa ni mngon sum log par nges pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir mngon sum log par bstan par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na don gzhan shes pa gcig la 'dre bar snang ba na de'i shes pa ni mngon sum log par nges pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir mngon sum log par bstan par blta bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, when an object that is different from consciousness appears mixed with it, the consciousness of that is the cause of the ascertainment of the falsity of direct perception, and thus it should be regarded as the teaching of the falsity of direct perception.

original: ci ste med du zin kyang shes pa gcig la 'dre ba mngon sum du gyur pa la bum pa la bum pa mngon sum nyid du sgo 'dogs pa de bzhin du shes pa gcig la 'dre ba mi rmongs par dra pa'i du byed 'das pa dang dang da
analyzed: ci ste med du zin kyang shes pa gcig la 'dre ba mngon sum du gyur pa la bum pa la bum pa mngon sum nyid du sgo 'dogs pa de bzhin du shes pa gcig la 'dre ba mi rmongs par dra pa'i du byed 'das pa dang dang da
translated: But even if it does not exist, when it appears mixed with a single consciousness, the pot is the superimposition of direct perception itself. In the same way, when it appears mixed with a single consciousness, the past and future are the superimposition of direct perception itself.

original: ltar ba la de'i rang bzhin gyi bum pa med kyang sgro btags par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: ltar ba la de'i rang bzhin gyi bum pa med kyang sgro btags par blta bar bya'o //
translated: In the same way, although a pot does not exist in the nature of the cloth, it is to be seen as superimposed on it.

original: 'dis ni snang ba mi dmigs pa mngon sum gyis bum pa log pa'i ngo bo yin la /
analyzed: 'dis ni snang ba mi dmigs pa mngon sum gyis bum pa log pa'i ngo bo yin la /
translated: By this, he shows that the non-apprehension of an appearance is a perception of the nature of the negation of the pot.

original: de yang grub zin pa des na bum pa med pa ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin gyi ;
analyzed: de yang grub zin pa des na bum pa med pa ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin gyi ;
translated: And since that is already established, the non-existence of the pot is not to be established.

original: 'on kyang med pa'i tha snyad yin no zhes bya bar bstan to //
analyzed: 'on kyang med pa'i tha snyad yin no zhes bya bar bstan to //
translated: But rather, it is the expression of non-existence.

original: bum pa la sogs pa gang la mthong bas dran pa bskyed pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'du byed ma rmongs pa ste /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa gang la mthong bas dran pa bskyed pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'du byed ma rmongs pa ste /
translated: That which is not confused about the nature of the compositional factors that give rise to memory through seeing a pot, etc.,

original: nyams pa med par yod pa de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: nyams pa med par yod pa de skad ces bya'o //
translated: and which exists without impairment, is called ‚Äúnot confused.‚Äù

original: sgrub pa po'i mngon sum 'das pa de dang sgrub pa'i mngon sum da ltar zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: sgrub pa po'i mngon sum 'das pa de dang sgrub pa'i mngon sum da ltar zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The past of the proponent‚Äôs perception and the present of the proponent‚Äôs perception are to be connected in this way.

original: ma rmongs par dran pa'i 'du byed smos pa ni da ltar bye brag tu byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ma rmongs par dran pa'i 'du byed smos pa ni da ltar bye brag tu byed pa ma yin te /
translated: The mention of the compositional factors of memory that are not confused is not a specification of the present.

original: 'di ltar 'das pa'i bum pas dben pa'i sa phyogs mthong ba la dran pa'i 'du byed rmongs pa yod pas bum pa mi dmigs pa la rmongs pa dang / bum pa mthong ba la rmongs par 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'das pa'i bum pas dben pa'i sa phyogs mthong ba la dran pa'i 'du byed rmongs pa yod pas bum pa mi dmigs pa la rmongs pa dang / bum pa mthong ba la rmongs par 'gyur /
translated: Thus, in the case of seeing a place devoid of a past pot, there is confusion about the application of memory, so there is confusion about the non-apprehension of a pot, and there is confusion about the seeing of a pot.

original: da ltar gyi la ni bum pas dben pa'i sa phyogs mthong ba nas dran pa'i 'du byed la rmongs pa med do //
analyzed: da ltar gyi la ni bum pas dben pa'i sa phyogs mthong ba nas dran pa'i 'du byed la rmongs pa med do //
translated: In the case of the present, there is no confusion about the application of memory from seeing a place devoid of a pot.

original: de bas na bum pa mi dmigs pa la yang rmongs pa ma yin la /
analyzed: de bas na bum pa mi dmigs pa la yang rmongs pa ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, there is no confusion about the non-apprehension of a pot,

original: bum pa la yang ma yin no //
analyzed: bum pa la yang ma yin no //
translated: nor is there confusion about a pot.

original: de bas na ma rmongs pa'i dran pa'i 'du byed smos pa ni da ltar gyi dgag bya khyad par du byed pa ni ma yin te ;
analyzed: de bas na ma rmongs pa'i dran pa'i 'du byed smos pa ni da ltar gyi dgag bya khyad par du byed pa ni ma yin te ;
translated: Therefore, the mention of the application of memory that is not confused does not distinguish the present object of negation,

original: da ltar gyi don la ni dran pa'i 'du byed 'khrul pas med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: da ltar gyi don la ni dran pa'i 'du byed 'khrul pas med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because in the case of the present object, the application of memory is not mistaken.

original: de'i phyir 'das pa dang da ltar gyi zhes bya ba la dang gi sgra byas pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'das pa dang da ltar gyi zhes bya ba la dang gi sgra byas pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, the term ‚Äúand‚Äù is used in ‚Äúpast and present,‚Äù

original: bye brag dang bral ba da ltar dang / bye brag dang ldan pa 'das pa bsdu ba ci ltar khong du chud par 'gyur ba de ltar byas so //
analyzed: bye brag dang bral ba da ltar dang / bye brag dang ldan pa 'das pa bsdu ba ci ltar khong du chud par 'gyur ba de ltar byas so //
translated: The present is free from distinctions, and the past is included in the present.

original: de la don 'di yin @54b te ;
analyzed: de la don 'di yin @54b te ;
translated: The meaning of this is as follows:

original: 'das pa'i mi dmigs pa gsal bar dran pa dang / da ltar gyi ni tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: 'das pa'i mi dmigs pa gsal bar dran pa dang / da ltar gyi ni tshad ma yin no //
translated: The non-apprehension of the past is clearly remembered, and the present is valid cognition.

original: de ltar na sngon 'di na bum pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar na sngon 'di na bum pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Thus, it is understood that previously there was no pot here,

original: dmigs par ma 'gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang / med de mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes shes pa zhus kyi /
analyzed: dmigs par ma 'gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang / med de mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes shes pa zhus kyi /
translated: because it was not apprehended, and that it does not exist, because it is not apprehended.

original: 'di na bum pa byis yod par 'gyur ba ma yin te ;üîΩmi dmigs pas 'gyur ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni shes par mi nus te /
analyzed: 'di na bum pa byis yod par 'gyur ba ma yin te ; mi dmigs pas 'gyur ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni shes par mi nus te /
translated: But it is not understood that the pot here will not exist,üîΩbecause it is not apprehended,

original: ma 'ongs pa'i mi dmigs pa yod par the tshom za ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i mi dmigs pa yod par the tshom za ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is doubt about the existence of the non-apprehension of the future.

original: de ltar mi dmigs pa'i dus kyi bye brag bshad nas byed pa ston par byed do //
analyzed: de ltar mi dmigs pa'i dus kyi bye brag bshad nas byed pa ston par byed do //
translated: Having explained the distinction of time in terms of non-apprehension in this way, he shows the activity.

original: med pa'i tha snyad ni med do zhes bya ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / de lta bu'i rnam pa can gyi sgra dang / dogs pa med par 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'jug pa lus kyi med pa'i tha snyad de /
analyzed: med pa'i tha snyad ni med do zhes bya ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / de lta bu'i rnam pa can gyi sgra dang / dogs pa med par 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'jug pa lus kyi med pa'i tha snyad de /
translated: The convention of nonexistence is the consciousness that thinks, ‚ÄúIt does not exist,‚Äù the sound that has that aspect, and the engagement that has the characteristic of going and coming without hesitation.

original: bum pa med par shes na ni the tshom med par 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la 'jug par byed do //
analyzed: bum pa med par shes na ni the tshom med par 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la 'jug par byed do //
translated: When one knows that a pot does not exist, one engages in going and coming without hesitation.üîΩThe convention of nonexistence is engaged in by all three aspects.

original: med pa'i tha snyad ni rnam pa de gsum char yang 'jug par byed sgrub par byed pa ni mthong ba snang ba mi dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: med pa'i tha snyad ni rnam pa de gsum char yang 'jug par byed sgrub par byed pa ni mthong ba snang ba mi dmigs pa yin no //
translated: The proof is the nonobservation of a visible object.

original: gal te yang bum pa med do snyam du shes pa ni mi dmigs pa kho na las 'gyur la /
analyzed: gal te yang bum pa med do snyam du shes pa ni mi dmigs pa kho na las 'gyur la /
translated: If one thinks, ‚ÄúA pot does not exist,‚Äù the knowledge that it does not exist arises from the nonobservation of it.

original: med par nges pa yang 'di nyid yin mod kyi /
analyzed: med par nges pa yang 'di nyid yin mod kyi /
translated: This is the ascertainment of nonexistence.

original: 'on kyang gang gi phyir mngon sum gyi phyogs nyi tshe dmigs pa de'i phyir 'di na bum pa med do zhes de ltar med par nges pa ni mngon sum gyis byed pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang gang gi phyir mngon sum gyi phyogs nyi tshe dmigs pa de'i phyir 'di na bum pa med do zhes de ltar med par nges pa ni mngon sum gyis byed pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yin no //
translated: However, because the side of perception is observed, therefore, in this way, the ascertainment of non-existence, ‚ÄúThere is no pot here,‚Äù is the consequence of the activity of perception.

original: de bas na phyogs nyi tshe 'dzin pa'i mngon sum gyi byed pa rjes su 'brang ba'i med par nges pa ni mngon sum gyis byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na phyogs nyi tshe 'dzin pa'i mngon sum gyi byed pa rjes su 'brang ba'i med par nges pa ni mngon sum gyis byas pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the ascertainment of non-existence, which is the consequence of the activity of perception that apprehends a side, is produced by perception.

original: gzhan yang sngar bshad pa'i tshul du snang ba mi dmigs pa'i nges par byed pa'i shugs nyid las mngon sum nyid kyis med par nges pa yin mod kyang /
analyzed: gzhan yang sngar bshad pa'i tshul du snang ba mi dmigs pa'i nges par byed pa'i shugs nyid las mngon sum nyid kyis med par nges pa yin mod kyang /
translated: Moreover, as explained earlier, the ascertainment of non-existence is certainly produced by perception itself, by the force of the ascertainment of the non-observation of the appearance.

original: 'on kyang mthong ba rnams kyang yod par dogs pa'i phyir na med pa'i tha snyad byed mi nas pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
analyzed: 'on kyang mthong ba rnams kyang yod par dogs pa'i phyir na med pa'i tha snyad byed mi nas pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
translated: However, because of the doubt that the appearances exist, one is simply unable to make the statement of non-existence.

original: de bas na mi dmigs pa ni gang gi phyir snang ba la mi dmigs pa de bas na med do zhes pa'i tha snyad byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na mi dmigs pa ni gang gi phyir snang ba la mi dmigs pa de bas na med do zhes pa'i tha snyad byed pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, because of the non-observation of the appearance, one makes the statement, ‚ÄúIt does not exist.‚Äù

original: de bas na snang ba mi dmigs pa ni med par shes par byas pa la 'jug par byed kyi /
analyzed: de bas na snang ba mi dmigs pa ni med par shes par byas pa la 'jug par byed kyi /
translated: Therefore, non-apprehension of appearance is engaged in by one who has ascertained non-existence,

original: ma byas pa la ni byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ma byas pa la ni byed pa ma yin te /
translated: but not by one who has not.

original: des na med par nges pa ni mi dmigs pa las gyur pa yin yang mngon sum gyis byas pa la mi dmigs pas 'jug par byas so zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: des na med par nges pa ni mi dmigs pa las gyur pa yin yang mngon sum gyis byas pa la mi dmigs pas 'jug par byas so zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: Thus, although ascertainment of non-existence is derived from non-apprehension, it is taught that one is engaged in it by non-apprehension of direct perception.

original: de ltar na mi dmigs pa ni @55a * //
analyzed: de ltar na mi dmigs pa ni @55a * //
translated: Thus, non-apprehension

original: med pa'i tha snyad du 'jug par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: med pa'i tha snyad du 'jug par byed pa yin no //
translated: is engaged in the expression of non-existence.

original: ci'i phyir 'das pa dang da ltar gyi kho na la mi dmigs pa go bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'das pa dang da ltar gyi kho na la mi dmigs pa go bar byed pa yin no //
translated: Why is non-apprehension of only the past and present engaged in the expression of non-existence?

original: de nyid kyis zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de nyid kyis zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, ‚Äúbecause of that,‚Äù

original: ji skad du bstan pa'i dus kyi mi dmigs pa'i las dngos po med par nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji skad du bstan pa'i dus kyi mi dmigs pa'i las dngos po med par nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the function of non-apprehension of the time as taught is to ascertain non-existence.

original: ma 'ongs pa'i mi dmigs pa ni rang nyid kyang the tshom za ba'i ngo bo yin te /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i mi dmigs pa ni rang nyid kyang the tshom za ba'i ngo bo yin te /
translated: Non-apprehension of the future is itself of the nature of doubt,üîΩbecause it is not ascertained.

original: ma grub pa de las ni dngos po med par nges pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang 'das pa dang da ltar yin no //
analyzed: ma grub pa de las ni dngos po med par nges pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang 'das pa dang da ltar yin no //
translated: But from the nonestablishment of that, there is no ascertainment of nonexistence; rather, it is past and present.

original: da ni mi dmigs pa'i rab tu dbye ba bstan pa'i phyir ro /üîΩde ni zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: da ni mi dmigs pa'i rab tu dbye ba bstan pa'i phyir ro / de ni zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Now, in order to teach the classification of nonapprehension, he says:üîΩThis is the elevenfold nonapprehension.

original: mi dmigs pa 'di'i rnam pa bcu gcig yod pas na rnam pa bcu gcig go //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa 'di'i rnam pa bcu gcig yod pas na rnam pa bcu gcig go //
translated: Since there are eleven varieties of this nonapprehension, it is elevenfold.

original: rnam par dbye ba gang las she na /
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba gang las she na /
translated: From what classification?

original: sbyor ba'i bye brag gis te /
analyzed: sbyor ba'i bye brag gis te /
translated: From the classification of application.

original: sbyor ba ni sbyar ba ste sgra'i rjod byed kyi byed pa la brjod do //
analyzed: sbyor ba ni sbyar ba ste sgra'i rjod byed kyi byed pa la brjod do //
translated: Application is the application, the function of the expression in words.

original: sgra yang kha cig ni dngos su //
analyzed: sgra yang kha cig ni dngos su //
translated: Some words express directly,

original: kha cig ni don gzhan gyi sgo nas rjod par byed kha cig ni don gzhan 'gog pa'i sgo nas rjod par byed do //
analyzed: kha cig ni don gzhan gyi sgo nas rjod par byed kha cig ni don gzhan 'gog pa'i sgo nas rjod par byed do //
translated: some express by way of another meaning, and some express by way of the negation of another meaning.

original: kun kyang snang ba mi dmigs pa yin par ni sgra ma smos kyang rig par bya'o //
analyzed: kun kyang snang ba mi dmigs pa yin par ni sgra ma smos kyang rig par bya'o //
translated: Although the words are not mentioned, it should be understood that all are the nonapprehension of appearance.

original: rjod par byed pa'i bye brag gis mi dmigs pa bye brag tu dpe'i /
analyzed: rjod par byed pa'i bye brag gis mi dmigs pa bye brag tu dpe'i /
translated: Nonapprehension is classified by the classification of the expression.

original: rang gi ngo bo la ni dbye ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo la ni dbye ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that there is no division in its own nature.

original: rnam par dbye ba bstan pa'i phyir /üîΩrang bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba bstan pa'i phyir / rang bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to demonstrate the analysis, he says,

original: dgag par bya ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de mi dmigs pa ni dper na zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dgag par bya ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de mi dmigs pa ni dper na zhes bya ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThe nature of the object of negation is not observed, for example,üîΩhere there is no smoke because of the absence of fire.‚Äù

original: 'di na zhes bya ba ni chos can no //
analyzed: 'di na zhes bya ba ni chos can no //
translated: Here, ‚Äúhere‚Äù is the subject.

original: du ba med de zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: du ba med de zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThere is no smoke‚Äù is the probandum.

original: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa las mi dmigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa las mi dmigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs so //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of the absence of fire‚Äù is the reason.

original: gtan tshigs 'di yang snga ma bzhin du bshad par bya'o //üîΩdgag par bya ba'i 'bras bu gang yin pa de mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'di yang snga ma bzhin du bshad par bya'o // dgag par bya ba'i 'bras bu gang yin pa de mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: This reason should be explained as before.

original: dper na zhes bya ba ni dpe 'god pa'o //
analyzed: dper na zhes bya ba ni dpe 'god pa'o //
translated: The nature of the object of negation is not observed, for example,üîΩhere there is no effect of smoke because of the absence of fire.‚Äù

original: 'di na zhes bya ba ni chos can no //
analyzed: 'di na zhes bya ba ni chos can no //
translated: ‚ÄúHere‚Äù is the subject.

original: du ba skyed pa'i nus pa thogs pa med pa thogs par yod pas gang dag yin pa thogs pa de dag med de zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'o//
analyzed: du ba skyed pa'i nus pa thogs pa med pa thogs par yod pas gang dag yin pa thogs pa de dag med de zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'o//
translated: The probandum is: ‚ÄúThat which has the capacity to produce smoke, but is obstructed, does not exist.

original: du ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: du ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //
translated: The reason is: ‚ÄúBecause there is no smoke.‚Äù

original: rgyu ni gdon mi za bar 'bras bu dang ldan pa ma yin pas na 'bras bu ma mthong pa las ni nus pa thogs pa dag kho na med pa ni bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: rgyu ni gdon mi za bar 'bras bu dang ldan pa ma yin pas na 'bras bu ma mthong pa las ni nus pa thogs pa dag kho na med pa ni bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi /
translated: Since a cause is not necessarily concomitant with its effect, the probandum is: ‚ÄúThe capacity is obstructed, but does not exist,‚Äù on the basis of not seeing the effect.

original: gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not anything else.

original: nus pa thogs pa med pa yang skad cig ma tha mar gyur pa gang yin @55b pa ste ;
analyzed: nus pa thogs pa med pa yang skad cig ma tha mar gyur pa gang yin @55b pa ste ;
translated: The capacity that is unobstructed is that which is in the final moment.

original: gzhan rnams la ni gegs yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan rnams la ni gegs yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The others are obstructed.

original: 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i yang gang du rgyu mi snang ba der sbyar bar bya ba yin gyi rgyu snang ba la ni snang ba mi dmigs pa kho na rtogs par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i yang gang du rgyu mi snang ba der sbyar bar bya ba yin gyi rgyu snang ba la ni snang ba mi dmigs pa kho na rtogs par byed pa yin no //
translated: The non-apprehension of an effect should be applied where the cause is not seen. But where the cause is seen, the non-apprehension of what is seen is the proof.

original: de la khang pa'i yang thog na gnas pa na khang pa dag ram mthong du zin kyang dag ra'i ngos bzhi'i rtsig pa mtha' dag mthong zhing rtsig pa mtha' dag dang lhan cig tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i nam mkha'i phyogs du ba dang bral ba mthong ngoüîΩ// de la du ba med par nges pa las ni me yul gang na gnas pas yul der ngu ba skyed par 'gyur ba'i nus pa thogs pa med pa'i me de med par rtogs par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: de la khang pa'i yang thog na gnas pa na khang pa dag ram mthong du zin kyang dag ra'i ngos bzhi'i rtsig pa mtha' dag mthong zhing rtsig pa mtha' dag dang lhan cig tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i nam mkha'i phyogs du ba dang bral ba mthong ngo // de la du ba med par nges pa las ni me yul gang na gnas pas yul der ngu ba skyed par 'gyur ba'i nus pa thogs pa med pa'i me de med par rtogs par bya ba yin la /
translated: When one is on the roof of a house, one sees the house and the courtyard, but one does not see the walls of the courtyard on all four sides; one sees the space in the courtyard free from smoke.üîΩFrom the ascertainment of the absence of smoke, one understands the absence of fire, which is the fire that has the power to produce smoke wherever it is located, without any obstruction.

original: khang pa dag ra'i phyogs na yod pa'i mes kyang du ba yul der skye bar gyur pa yin pa des na phyogs de na me med par khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: khang pa dag ra'i phyogs na yod pa'i mes kyang du ba yul der skye bar gyur pa yin pa des na phyogs de na me med par khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: Since the fire located in the courtyard produces smoke in that place, one should understand that there is no fire in that place.

original: khyim gyi dag ra'i phyogs rtsig pas yongs su bskor ba de rtsig pa'i mtha' thug par gnas pa snang ba'i bdag nyid can du bas dben pa'i nam mkha'i yul dang bcas te chos can du byed de /üîΩde bas na snang ba'i nam mkha'i cha shes can mngon sum du gyur pa 'am /
analyzed: khyim gyi dag ra'i phyogs rtsig pas yongs su bskor ba de rtsig pa'i mtha' thug par gnas pa snang ba'i bdag nyid can du bas dben pa'i nam mkha'i yul dang bcas te chos can du byed de / de bas na snang ba'i nam mkha'i cha shes can mngon sum du gyur pa 'am /
translated: The subject is the part of the sky that is the container of the appearance of the space that is enclosed by the walls of the house.

original: mngon sum du ma gyur pa ni chos can yin par me med par shes pa'i shugs 'ongs pa yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum du ma gyur pa ni chos can yin par me med par shes pa'i shugs 'ongs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the part of the sky that is the container of the appearance is either the subject that is directly perceived or the subject that is not directly perceived.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba mngon sum gyi tshig tu bstan pa ni snang ba'i phyogs la ltos pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba mngon sum gyi tshig tu bstan pa ni snang ba'i phyogs la ltos pa yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúhere‚Äù is taught as a word of direct perception, and it is in relation to the part of the sky that is the container of the appearance.

original: 'dir 'ba' zhig la snang ba dang mi snang ba spyi chos can yin par ma zad kyi gzhan du yang yin te /
analyzed: 'dir 'ba' zhig la snang ba dang mi snang ba spyi chos can yin par ma zad kyi gzhan du yang yin te /
translated: Not only is the general subject here the part of the sky that is the container of the appearance and the part of the sky that is not the container of the appearance, but it is also something else.

original: sgra skad cig ma nyid du bsgrub par bya ba la sgra gcig ni mngon sum du gyur pa yin la /
analyzed: sgra skad cig ma nyid du bsgrub par bya ba la sgra gcig ni mngon sum du gyur pa yin la /
translated: In the proof that sound is momentary, one sound is directly perceived,

original: gzhan ni lkog tu gyur pa de bzhin du 'dir yang yin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni lkog tu gyur pa de bzhin du 'dir yang yin no //
translated: and the other is not directly perceived. It is the same here.

original: ji ltar 'dir chos can ni bsgrub par bya ba rtogs pa'i gzhir gyur pa snang ba dang mi snang ba'i cha shas bstan pa de bzhin du sbyor ba phyi ma rnams la yang rang nyid kyis khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dir chos can ni bsgrub par bya ba rtogs pa'i gzhir gyur pa snang ba dang mi snang ba'i cha shas bstan pa de bzhin du sbyor ba phyi ma rnams la yang rang nyid kyis khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: Just as the subject is taught here as the basis for understanding the probandum, with its appearing and non-appearing parts, so should one understand it in the following syllogisms.

original: khyab par bya ba dgag par bya ba la khyab par byed pa'i chos gang yin pa de mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: khyab par bya ba dgag par bya ba la khyab par byed pa'i chos gang yin pa de mi dmigs pa'o //

translated: If that were so, then just as one accepts the appearance of a pot and refutes it on the basis of the non-apprehension of its appearance, in the same way, all mutually exclusive and contradictory things are refuted on the basis of the appearance of the other.üîΩThe non-apprehension of appearance is the only way to refute them.

translated: This reason is used when the contact of cold, which is to be refuted, and the pervader, the contact of heat, are not seen.

original: khyab par byed pa snang ba mi dmigs pa sbyor bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: khyab par byed pa snang ba mi dmigs pa sbyor bar bya ba yin no //
translated: But when both of them are seen, the reason is used in the form of a non-observation of a nature or a pervader.

original: de lta na med par bsgrub pa 'di ni rtogs par byed pa rgyang ring po na 'dug la /
analyzed: de lta na med par bsgrub pa 'di ni rtogs par byed pa rgyang ring po na 'dug la /
translated: In this way, the establishment of the absence of the contact of cold is done by one who is far away.

original: ba mo'i reg pa grang ba'i bye brag dang grang ba tsam ni lkog tu gyur pa yin la /
analyzed: ba mo'i reg pa grang ba'i bye brag dang grang ba tsam ni lkog tu gyur pa yin la /
translated: The contact of cold, which is a particular kind of cold, and mere cold are hidden.

original: me ni gzugs kyi bye brag gis rgyang ring po na 'dug kyang mngon sum du gyur to //
analyzed: me ni gzugs kyi bye brag gis rgyang ring po na 'dug kyang mngon sum du gyur to //
translated: But fire, by means of a particular form, is seen even when it is far away.

original: de bas na ni me la ni grang ba tsam med par nges pa yin la /
analyzed: de bas na ni me la ni grang ba tsam med par nges pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, it is ascertained that fire does not have mere cold.

original: de las ni grang ba'i bye brag ba mo'i reg pa med par nges pa yin te /
analyzed: de las ni grang ba'i bye brag ba mo'i reg pa med par nges pa yin te /
translated: And from that, the particular cold sensation of snow is ascertained to be absent,

original: grang ba'i bye brag ni grang ba'i spyis khyab par bya ba yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: grang ba'i bye brag ni grang ba'i spyis khyab par bya ba yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: because the particular cold sensation is pervaded by the universal cold sensation.

original: yul gyi bye brag de la rjes su dpag pa 'di sbyor bar bya'o //
analyzed: yul gyi bye brag de la rjes su dpag pa 'di sbyor bar bya'o //
translated: This inference should be applied to that particular object.

original: dgag par bya ba'i rgyu gang yin pa de mi dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: dgag par bya ba'i rgyu gang yin pa de mi dmigs pa ste /
translated: The non-apprehension of the cause of the object to be refuted is as follows:

original: dper na zhes bya ba ni dpe 'god pa'o //
analyzed: dper na zhes bya ba ni dpe 'god pa'o //
translated: For example, is the statement of the example.

original: 'di na zhes bya ba ni chos can no //
analyzed: 'di na zhes bya ba ni chos can no //
translated: Here is the subject.

original: du ba med do zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: du ba med do zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: There is no smoke is the probandum.

original: me med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: me med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //
translated: Because there is no fire is the reason.

original: gang na 'bras bu yod kyang snang ba mi 'byung ba der ni 'dir sbyor ba bya'o //
analyzed: gang na 'bras bu yod kyang snang ba mi 'byung ba der ni 'dir sbyor ba bya'o //
translated: Where the effect exists but the appearance does not occur, there the application should be made here.

original: 'bras bu snang ba la ni snang ba mi dmigs pa nyid go bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu snang ba la ni snang ba mi dmigs pa nyid go bar byed pa yin no //
translated: As for the appearance of the effect, the non-apprehension of the appearance itself is the convincer.

original: de bas na dngos po med par bsgrub pa 'di lang mtsho chen po mi g-yo ba dgun rlangs pa mang du 'thul ba la nam mkha' 'o zi tsam du gyur ba na de na du ba yod kyang mi snang bas rgyu mi dmigs pas dgag par bya ba
analyzed: de bas na dngos po med par bsgrub pa 'di lang mtsho chen po mi g-yo ba dgun rlangs pa mang du 'thul ba la nam mkha' 'o zi tsam du gyur ba na de na du ba yod kyang mi snang bas rgyu mi dmigs pas dgag par bya ba
translated: Even though there is smoke there, it is not visible, so the non-apprehension of the cause is the negation.

original: yin no // chu de'i steng na me 'bar ba yin na ni gzugs kyi khyad par nyid dmigs par 'gyur la /
analyzed: yin no // chu de'i steng na me 'bar ba yin na ni gzugs kyi khyad par nyid dmigs par 'gyur la /
translated: If fire were burning on the surface of that water, a special form would be observed.

original: 'bar ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'bar ba yang ma yin te /
translated: But it is not burning.

original: shing tshig pa la yod na der yang tshig pa yod na shing mngon sum du gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: shing tshig pa la yod na der yang tshig pa yod na shing mngon sum du gyur pa yin no //
translated: If it were burning where the wood is, then there would be burning there, and the wood would be directly perceived.

original: des na me ni rang gi ngo bo 'am gzhi'i ngo bo de rnam par 'gyur bas na der sbyor ba 'di bya'o //
analyzed: des na me ni rang gi ngo bo 'am gzhi'i ngo bo de rnam par 'gyur bas na der sbyor ba 'di bya'o //
translated: Therefore, fire is applied there by the transformation of its own nature or the nature of its basis.

original: dgag par bya ba'i rgyu gang yin pa de dang 'gal ba gang yin pa de dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: dgag par bya ba'i rgyu gang yin pa de dang 'gal ba gang yin pa de dmigs pa ste /
translated: Whatever is the cause of negation, whatever is incompatible with that is observed.

original: dper na zhes bya ba ni dpe dgod pa'o //
analyzed: dper na zhes bya ba ni dpe dgod pa'o //
translated: For example is the statement of the example.

original: 'di la zhes bya ba ni chos can no //
analyzed: 'di la zhes bya ba ni chos can no //
translated: Here is the subject.

original: spu langs zhes bya ba ni spu langs pa'o //
analyzed: spu langs zhes bya ba ni spu langs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWith the hair standing on end‚Äù means with the hair erect.

original: de la sogs pa ni @58a * //
analyzed: de la sogs pa ni @58a * //
translated: ‚ÄúAnd so on‚Äù

original: lhags pas nyen pa'i so tham tham byed pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lhags pas nyen pa'i so tham tham byed pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: refers to shivering and so on, which are the effects of cold.

original: de las gzhan pa'i 'jigs pa dang / dad pa la sogs pa las bye brag tu gyur pa ni yul lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bye brag ste /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i 'jigs pa dang / dad pa la sogs pa las bye brag tu gyur pa ni yul lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bye brag ste /
translated: ‚ÄúOther than that‚Äù refers to the particular object of fear, faith, and so on.

original: de med do zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de med do zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat does not exist‚Äù is the probandum.

original: me gzhan las gdung ba nyid bye brag tu gyur pa ni grang ba zlog par nus pa yin pas na gdung bar byed pa'i bye brag ste /
analyzed: me gzhan las gdung ba nyid bye brag tu gyur pa ni grang ba zlog par nus pa yin pas na gdung bar byed pa'i bye brag ste /
translated: The particular object of heat, which is different from other things, is capable of countering cold, and so is the particular object of heat.

original: gdung bar byed pa kha cig yod du zin kyang /
analyzed: gdung bar byed pa kha cig yod du zin kyang /
translated: Even though some object of heat exists,

original: dper na sgron ma bzhin du grang bzlog par byed pa ma yin pa de lta bu bsal ba'i phyir bye brag smos so //
analyzed: dper na sgron ma bzhin du grang bzlog par byed pa ma yin pa de lta bu bsal ba'i phyir bye brag smos so //
translated: like a lamp, it does not counter cold. In order to exclude that, the particular is mentioned.

original: gdung ba'i bye brag gang yin pa nye ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gdung ba'i bye brag gang yin pa nye ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That which is the particular object of heat is called that.

original: de'i dngos po ni de nyid de /
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni de nyid de /
translated: Its nature is just that.

original: de bas na zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore‚Äù is the reason.

original: gang na grang ba'i reg pa yod kyang mi snang ba dang / spu long zhes byed pa'i bye brag yod kyang mi snang ba'i der 'di'i sbyor ba bya ba yin gyi /üîΩspu long zhes byed pa'i bye brag snang ba nyid la ni snang ba mi dmigs pa sbyor bar byed pa yin la /
analyzed: gang na grang ba'i reg pa yod kyang mi snang ba dang / spu long zhes byed pa'i bye brag yod kyang mi snang ba'i der 'di'i sbyor ba bya ba yin gyi / spu long zhes byed pa'i bye brag snang ba nyid la ni snang ba mi dmigs pa sbyor bar byed pa yin la /
translated: But when cold contact is present, it is not seen, and the specific state called ‚Äúgoose bumps‚Äù is not seen.

original: grang ba'i reg pa snang ba nyid la yang rgyu mi dmigs pa'i sbyor bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: grang ba'i reg pa snang ba nyid la yang rgyu mi dmigs pa'i sbyor bar byed pa yin no //
translated: The application of non-observation of a cause is made in the case of the appearance of the specific state called ‚Äúgoose bumps,‚Äù and the application of non-observation of a pervader is made in the case of the appearance of cold contact.

original: de bas na dngos po med pa bsgrub pa 'di yang gdung bar byed pa'i gzugs kyi bye brag rgyang ring po nas kyang mthong ba yin la /
analyzed: de bas na dngos po med pa bsgrub pa 'di yang gdung bar byed pa'i gzugs kyi bye brag rgyang ring po nas kyang mthong ba yin la /
translated: Therefore, in this proof of the absence of a thing, the specific state of the form that is the cause of goose bumps is seen from a distance,

original: grang ba'i reg ba dang spu long zhes byed pa'i bye brag ni ma mthong ba de dag gi rgyu dang 'gal ba mi dmigs pas dngos po med par rtogs par byed pa de la 'di'i sbyor ba bya'o //
analyzed: grang ba'i reg ba dang spu long zhes byed pa'i bye brag ni ma mthong ba de dag gi rgyu dang 'gal ba mi dmigs pas dngos po med par rtogs par byed pa de la 'di'i sbyor ba bya'o //
translated: but the cold contact and the specific state called ‚Äúgoose bumps‚Äù are not seen. The application of the reason is made in the case of the non-observation of the cause and the non-observation of the pervader of those two.

original: dgag par bya ba'i rgyu gang yin pa de dang 'gal ba de'i 'bras bu de dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: dgag par bya ba'i rgyu gang yin pa de dang 'gal ba de'i 'bras bu de dmigs pa ste /
translated: The effect of that which is incompatible with the cause of the object of negation is observed.

original: dper na zhes bya ba ni dpe 'god pa'o //
analyzed: dper na zhes bya ba ni dpe 'god pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúFor example‚Äù sets forth the example.

original: phyogs 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bye brag dang ldan pa'i 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bye brag dang ldan pa'i 'brel pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThis position‚Äù is the connection with the specification and so on.

original: spu long zhes byed pa la sogs pa'i bye brag gis ldan pa ni spu long zhes byed pa la sogs pa'i bye brag dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: spu long zhes byed pa la sogs pa'i bye brag gis ldan pa ni spu long zhes byed pa la sogs pa'i bye brag dang ldan pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving the specification of goose bumps‚Äù is having the specification of goose bumps and so on.

original: de dang 'brel ba'i mi ni spu long zhes byed pa la sogs pa'i bye brag dang ldan pa'i mi ste /
analyzed: de dang 'brel ba'i mi ni spu long zhes byed pa la sogs pa'i bye brag dang ldan pa'i mi ste /
translated: The man who is connected with that is the man who has the specification of goose bumps and so on.

original: de de dang ldan pa ma yin pa ni bsgrub par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de de dang ldan pa ma yin pa ni bsgrub par bya ba'o //
translated: The opposite of that is the probandum.

original: du ba yod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: du ba yod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause smoke exists‚Äù is the reason.

original: spu long zhes byed pa'i bye brag mngon sum du gyur na ni snang ba ma yin pa yin la /
analyzed: spu long zhes byed pa'i bye brag mngon sum du gyur na ni snang ba ma yin pa yin la /
translated: When the specification of goose bumps and so on is directly perceived, it is not a nonappearance.

original: rgyu grang ba'i reg pa mngon sum du gyur na ni rgyu mi dmigs pa yin la /
analyzed: rgyu grang ba'i reg pa mngon sum du gyur na ni rgyu mi dmigs pa yin la /
translated: When the cause, the sensation of cold, is directly perceived, it is the nonobservation of the cause.

original: me mngon sum du gyur na ni rgyu dang 'gal ba dmigs pa'i @58b sbyor ba bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: me mngon sum du gyur na ni rgyu dang 'gal ba dmigs pa'i @58b sbyor ba bya ba yin gyi /
translated: If fire were directly perceived, the syllogism would be one of the perception of a contradictory object.

original: 'di gsum char yang mi snang ba 'di la sbyor bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di gsum char yang mi snang ba 'di la sbyor bar bya ba yin no //
translated: But all three of these are absent in the case of the non-perception of smoke.

original: de bas na dngos po med par sgrub pa 'di ni rtogs par byed pa rgyang ring po na 'dug la /
analyzed: de bas na dngos po med par sgrub pa 'di ni rtogs par byed pa rgyang ring po na 'dug la /
translated: Therefore, the proof of the non-existence of an entity is one in which the means of valid cognition is remote.

original: grang ba'i reg pas nyen pa'i spu long zhes byed pa la sogs pa'i bye brag yod du zin kyang mngon sum du ma gyur la /
analyzed: grang ba'i reg pas nyen pa'i spu long zhes byed pa la sogs pa'i bye brag yod du zin kyang mngon sum du ma gyur la /
translated: Even though the shivering, etc., of one afflicted by cold are present, they are not directly perceived.

original: gang na du ba mngon sum du gyur pa der 'di tshang ma yin no //
analyzed: gang na du ba mngon sum du gyur pa der 'di tshang ma yin no //
translated: But where smoke is directly perceived, all of this is present.

original: du ba yang yul de na yod pa'i grang ba zlog par nus pa'i me rjes su dpog par byed nus pa ci 'dra ba de 'dir gzung bar bya'i /
analyzed: du ba yang yul de na yod pa'i grang ba zlog par nus pa'i me rjes su dpog par byed nus pa ci 'dra ba de 'dir gzung bar bya'i /
translated: And the smoke that is capable of inferring the fire that is capable of counteracting the cold present in that place should be understood to be the one that is apprehended here.

original: du ba tsam gyis me tsam rjes su dpog par byed kyang grang ba'i reg pa sel ba dang / spu long zhes byed pa la sogs pa sel bar byed pa shes par nus pa ma yin pas du ba tsam ni gtan tshigs ma yin par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: du ba tsam gyis me tsam rjes su dpog par byed kyang grang ba'i reg pa sel ba dang / spu long zhes byed pa la sogs pa sel bar byed pa shes par nus pa ma yin pas du ba tsam ni gtan tshigs ma yin par blta bar bya'o //
translated: Although one infers mere fire from mere smoke, one cannot know that it dispels cold touch or that it causes the hair of the body to stand on end. Therefore, mere smoke should be seen as not being a logical reason.

original: ci ste gcig ni dgag par sgrub pa'i gtan tshigs yin par bstan na dngos po med pa'i gtan tshigs bcu gcig tu ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste gcig ni dgag par sgrub pa'i gtan tshigs yin par bstan na dngos po med pa'i gtan tshigs bcu gcig tu ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If one is taught that one is a logical reason that proves a negation, how can there be eleven types of logical reasons that are non-affirming negations?

original: 'bras bu mi dmigs pa la sogs pa zhes smos te /
analyzed: 'bras bu mi dmigs pa la sogs pa zhes smos te /
translated: [The root text] says, ‚Äúnon-observation of effect, etc.‚Äù

original: de dag ces bya ba 'dis ni mi dmigs pa'i sbyor ba bstan pa 'das ma thag pa bstan to //
analyzed: de dag ces bya ba 'dis ni mi dmigs pa'i sbyor ba bstan pa 'das ma thag pa bstan to //
translated: The word ‚Äúthese‚Äù refers to the immediately preceding explanation of the application of non-observation.

original: de la gang yang rung ba gzung bar thal bar 'gyur bas na 'bras bu mi dmigs pa la sogs pa smos so //üîΩ'bras bu mi dmigs pa la sogs pa yang gsum mam /
analyzed: de la gang yang rung ba gzung bar thal bar 'gyur bas na 'bras bu mi dmigs pa la sogs pa smos so // 'bras bu mi dmigs pa la sogs pa yang gsum mam /
translated: Since it would follow that any one of those could be taken, [the root text] says ‚Äúnon-observation of effect, etc.‚Äù

original: bzhi zhig gzung bar thal bar 'gyur bas bcu zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: bzhi zhig gzung bar thal bar 'gyur bas bcu zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Since it would follow that three or four of those could be taken, [the root text] says ‚Äúten.‚Äù

original: de la bcus kyang dpe bkod ba tsam gzung bar thal bar 'gyur ba la /
analyzed: de la bcus kyang dpe bkod ba tsam gzung bar thal bar 'gyur ba la /
translated: Even if one were to mention ten, it would follow that only the mere examples would be grasped.

original: thams cad ces bya ba smos so //
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba smos so //
translated: Therefore, he says ‚Äúall.‚Äù

original: 'di skad bstan te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan te /
translated: This is what is taught.

original: dpe sbyar bar bya ba dang 'dra ba thams cad kyang yin no //
analyzed: dpe sbyar bar bya ba dang 'dra ba thams cad kyang yin no //
translated: All that is similar to what is exemplified is also included.

original: bcu smos pa med par thams cad smos pa byas na ni dpe sbyar bar byas pa mtha' dag go bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: bcu smos pa med par thams cad smos pa byas na ni dpe sbyar bar byas pa mtha' dag go bar 'gyur la /
translated: If one mentions all without mentioning ten, then all that is exemplified is understood.

original: bcu smos kyang dpe sbyar ba mtha' dag go bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bcu smos kyang dpe sbyar ba mtha' dag go bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Even if one mentions ten, all that is exemplified is understood.

original: thams cad smos pa lhag par byas na ni dpe sbyar ba dang 'dra ba mtha' rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad smos pa lhag par byas na ni dpe sbyar ba dang 'dra ba mtha' rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one mentions all in excess, then all that is similar to what is exemplified is understood.

original: rang bzhin mi dmigs bar 'dus pa ni de'i bdag nyid du 'gro ba yin te /
analyzed: rang bzhin mi dmigs bar 'dus pa ni de'i bdag nyid du 'gro ba yin te /
translated: The non-observation of nature is included in that, because it is the same nature.

original: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it has the nature of the non-observation of nature.

original: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i sbyor ba las 'bras bu mi dmigs pa la sogs pa'i tha dad pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i sbyor ba las 'bras bu mi dmigs pa la sogs pa'i tha dad pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt the effect of the application of the non-observation of nature different from the non-observation of effect and so on?

original: ci ltar der 'dus pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar der 'dus pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is it included there?

original: sbyor ba tha dad kyang zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: sbyor ba tha dad kyang zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: ‚ÄúAlthough the probative reasons are different‚Äù means

original: sbyor ba'i sgra'i byed pa tha dad kyang 'dus pa yin no //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i sgra'i byed pa tha dad kyang 'dus pa yin no //
translated: that although the words of the probative reasons are different, they are included in the two.

original: @59a * // 'di ltar sbyor ba tha dad ce na /
analyzed: @59a * // 'di ltar sbyor ba tha dad ce na /
translated: If it is asked, ‚ÄúHow are the probative reasons different?‚Äù

original: don gzhan yod pa dang zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: don gzhan yod pa dang zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: ‚ÄúThe existence of another object‚Äù is mentioned.

original: dgag par bya ba'i don las don gzhan yin par dmigs te /
analyzed: dgag par bya ba'i don las don gzhan yin par dmigs te /
translated: The existence of another object is observed to be the opposite of the object of negation.

original: rang bzhin 'gal ba dmigs pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba la bya'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin 'gal ba dmigs pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba la bya'o //
translated: The probative reasons of observing a contradictory essence and so on are applied.

original: dgag pa ni 'bras bu mi dmigs pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba la bya'o //
analyzed: dgag pa ni 'bras bu mi dmigs pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba la bya'o //
translated: The negation is applied to the probative reasons of the nonobservation of an effect and so on.

original: don las gzhan yod pa dang don gzhan dgag pa'i sgo nas sbyor ba tha dad pa yin no //
analyzed: don las gzhan yod pa dang don gzhan dgag pa'i sgo nas sbyor ba tha dad pa yin no //
translated: The probative reasons are different in terms of the existence of another object and the negation of another object.

original: gal te sbyor ba gzhan rnams su don gzhan yod pa dang dgag pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te sbyor ba gzhan rnams su don gzhan yod pa dang dgag pa yin no //
translated: If the probative reasons are different in terms of the existence of another object and the negation of another object,

original: 'o na ji ltar na du ba 'dus pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar na du ba 'dus pa yin zhe na /
translated: then how is smoke included?

original: brgyud pa'i sgo nas zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: brgyud pa'i sgo nas zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: ‚ÄúThrough the indirect process‚Äù is mentioned.

original: zo chun brgyud pa lta bu zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zo chun brgyud pa lta bu zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is like the indirect process of a waterwheel.
