analyzed: the tshom za ba'i phyir ldog pa mi grub bo //
translated: Because there is doubt, the contrapositive is not established.

original: ci'i phyir 'gal ba med cen /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'gal ba med cen /
translated: Why is there no contradiction?

original: gang gi phyir 'gal ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'gal ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: Because there are two kinds of contradiction.

original: ni zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir ro //
analyzed: ni zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúNi‚Äù means ‚Äúbecause.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir 'gal ba med pa de bas na the tshom pa gnyis kho na ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'gal ba med pa de bas na the tshom pa gnyis kho na ste /
translated: Because there is no contradiction, therefore there are only two doubts.

original: gzhan med pa de bas na smra ba nyid dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gnyis 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: gzhan med pa de bas na smra ba nyid dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gnyis 'gal ba med do //
translated: Since there is no other, there is no contradiction between being a speaker and being omniscient.

original: 'gal ba rnam ba gnyis po gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'gal ba rnam ba gnyis po gang zhe na /
translated: What are the two kinds of contradiction?

original: rgyu ma tshang ba med par zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rgyu ma tshang ba med par zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The root text says, ‚ÄúWhen the cause is complete.‚Äù

original: rgyu ma tshogs te ma tshang ba med pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //üîΩrgyu ma tshang ba las med pa gang yin pa de ni gang yang 'gal bar mi rtogs te /
analyzed: rgyu ma tshogs te ma tshang ba med pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o // rgyu ma tshang ba las med pa gang yin pa de ni gang yang 'gal bar mi rtogs te /
translated: A cause is complete when it is not deficient.üîΩWhen a cause is deficient, it is not possible to understand that it is contradictory.

original: de ni gang dang yang 'gal ba yod pa ma yin pa de bas na /
analyzed: de ni gang dang yang 'gal ba yod pa ma yin pa de bas na /
translated: It is not contradictory with anything.

original: rgyu ma tshang ba med pa smras so //
analyzed: rgyu ma tshang ba med pa smras so //
translated: Therefore, the root text says, ‚ÄúWhen the cause is complete.‚Äù

original: rgyu tshogs pa gang yin pa de yang dgag par sus kyang mi nus pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: rgyu tshogs pa gang yin pa de yang dgag par sus kyang mi nus pa ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt it impossible for anyone to refute the collection of causes?

original: de bas na 'gal ba gang las rtogs she na /
analyzed: de bas na 'gal ba gang las rtogs she na /
translated: So how can you understand that it is contradictory?

original: de lta na 'o na ni rgyu ma tshang ba med pa yang gang gis rgyu ma tshang bar byas pas med pa de dang 'gal bar rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta na 'o na ni rgyu ma tshang ba med pa yang gang gis rgyu ma tshang bar byas pas med pa de dang 'gal bar rtogs pa yin no //
translated: In that case, when the cause is complete, it is understood to be contradictory with that which makes the cause incomplete.

original: de lta na yin dang gang zhig gang dang 'gal ba de ni de la cung zad byed pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: de lta na yin dang gang zhig gang dang 'gal ba de ni de la cung zad byed pa kho na yin te /
translated: In that case, whatever is contradictory with something is only partially effective with respect to that.

original: 'di ltar grang ba'i reg pa'i skyed byed du gyur pas grang ba'i reg pa bzhin skyed pa'i nus pa 'joms par byed pa ni zlog par byed pas grang ba'i reg pa dang 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar grang ba'i reg pa'i skyed byed du gyur pas grang ba'i reg pa bzhin skyed pa'i nus pa 'joms par byed pa ni zlog par byed pas grang ba'i reg pa dang 'gal ba yin no //
translated: Thus, just as cold contact is the producer of cold contact, the capacity to produce is destroyed by the destroyer, and the cold contact is opposed to the cold contact.

original: de bas na bzlog par bya ba'i rgyu ma tshang ba'i byed pas skyed par byed pa kho na 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: de bas na bzlog par bya ba'i rgyu ma tshang ba'i byed pas skyed par byed pa kho na 'gal ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, the producer is opposed to the object to be destroyed by the absence of the cause of the destruction.

original: 'gal ba 'di lhan cig tu mi gnas pa yang yin te /
analyzed: 'gal ba 'di lhan cig tu mi gnas pa yang yin te /
translated: This opposition is also non-coexistence.

original: de bas na 'gal ba gnyis ni skad cig gcig la yang lhan cig tu gnas par bya ba dang / bar ring por gnas pa gnyis la 'gal ba med pas na nye bar gnas pa dag zlog par byed pa dang / bzlog par bya ba'i dngos por gzhag go //
analyzed: de bas na 'gal ba gnyis ni skad cig gcig la yang lhan cig tu gnas par bya ba dang / bar ring por gnas pa gnyis la 'gal ba med pas na nye bar gnas pa dag zlog par byed pa dang / bzlog par bya ba'i dngos por gzhag go //
translated: Therefore, the two oppositions are established as the object to be destroyed and the destroyer, because there is no contradiction in the two, the near and the distant, coexisting in one moment.

original: de bas @76b na gang zhig gang gis zlog par byed pa des ni de ltar myur na de skad cig gsum pa la zlog par byed do //
analyzed: de bas @76b na gang zhig gang gis zlog par byed pa des ni de ltar myur na de skad cig gsum pa la zlog par byed do //
translated: Therefore, if something is to be destroyed by something, it is destroyed by that in the third moment, if it is quick.

original: skad cig ma dang po la ni tshogs pa na nus pa med pa'i gnas skabs su rung bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: skad cig ma dang po la ni tshogs pa na nus pa med pa'i gnas skabs su rung bar byed pa yin no //
translated: In the first moment, it makes the object suitable, in the state of not having the capacity to be a collection.

original: gnyis pa la yang 'gal ba nus pa med par byed do //
analyzed: gnyis pa la yang 'gal ba nus pa med par byed do //
translated: In the second, it makes the capacity of the opposing factor not function.

original: gsum pa la ni nus pa med par 'gags pa'i yul der 'ong bar byed do //
analyzed: gsum pa la ni nus pa med par 'gags pa'i yul der 'ong bar byed do //
translated: In the third, it makes the object come into the place where the capacity has ceased.
